title: 7 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A sumptuously appointed and strikingly spacious five bedroom Edwardian terrace, arranged across three floors, raised above road level and set back nicely from your peaceful residential street. With dual receptions, twin bathrooms and a lush, lengthy rear garden this is the perfect family home.

One of many green spaces within easy reach, the Green Flag award winning Clayhall Park is less than five minutes away on foot. There's a rose garden, tennis courts, children's play area and a choice of cafes.

If you lived here

You'll be luxuriating in 1500 square feet of living space, step through the front door (noting the lovely stained glass insets) and your double width hallway immediately impresses with strikingly grained engineered hardwood underfoot, flowing into your dining room to the front. At almost 180 square feet there's plenty of room in here for the largest of gatherings and that sleek flooring looks even better bathed in natural light from the bay window.

Next door your second reception's just as bright and sizeable with its own bay window inset with patio doors giving way to the sixty foot long garden. Out here you have a length of lawn bookended by generous patios at either end, flanked by timber fencing and home to a handy shed. Back inside and your kitchen's decked out with pine cabinets and glossy worktops, while upstairs your first bathroom's immaculately finished in large format tiling, including around the large sunken tub.

Your first floor's also home to a pair of substantial bedrooms, around 160 square feet apiece with plush carpets and plenty of natural light. Bedroom three is a generous single, currently in use as a walk in wardrobe, but equally ideal for a child or home office. Head into the loft conversion for your second bathroom, a pristine shower room, plus two more double bedrooms with a garden view and twin skylights respectively.

What else?

- Drivers can be on the North Circular, or speeding out of London on the M11, in a little over five minutes.
- Parents will be happy to note that you have seven schools rated 'Outstanding' by Ofsted less than a mile away on foot, including Parkhill Infants right around the corner.
- With all that open space to the rear, you have the scope to extend your substantial new property still further (subject to the usual permissions).

A word from the owner....

"My family and I have lived at our home for the past 14 years. The area is quiet, with a beautiful local park around the corner, called Clayhall Park. We are less than 5 minutes drive from the local leisure centre, also Fairlop waters which is an amazing outdoor space for walks, boat rides, cycling and other outdoor activities. We are also very close to Valentine's Park, which is yet again very beautiful park including a cafe, boating area etc. There is also Valentine's Mansion, which was a stately home and is now a museum.

There is Claybury Woods, which is yet again a large outdoor space for walking, cycling, dog walking etc. On Claybury Broadway there are Cafes, a very good local chip shop, local general store also a pharmacy."

A Two Double Bedroom Upper Floor Maisonette with Own Rear Garden and Outbuilding, plus Loft Space. Conveniently located close to Barkingside High Street shops, amenities, Schools and Fairlop Central Line Station with a bus route on your doorstep. This property internally offers a Living Room, separate fitted Kitchen, two double bedrooms and family bathroom/wc. You will also find the loft space and the landing cupboard for storage.
Externally to the rear you will find your own private garden with an Outbuilding, ideal for working from home, or playroom. Parking is free on the street outside.

title: 2 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
Millennium Residential are pleased to offer for sale this two bedroom first floor apartment situated within this popular private residential cul-de-sac. Located within a short distance walk to Chadwell Heath & Goodmayes British Rail Stations as well as Newbury Park underground station, the property consists of two double bedrooms, bright and airy reception room, separate fully fitted kitchen, fully tiled family bathroom, off street parking, balcony, large entrance hallway, double glazing, gas central heating and many more features.

This property boasts good natural lighting, lots of storage in the bedrooms, modern integrated kitchen appliances and a spacious lounge with a balcony that allows for a dining table. The main bathroom consists of a bathtub with an attached shower rail, a hand washbasin and a w.c.

There are also lots of local amenities including a comprehensive range of local shops, eateries and supermarkets. The property is also surrounded by a number of reputable schools. The local area provides excellent road links into London and out of town via the A12, A13, A406, M11 and M25.

detailedDescription:
Guide Price - £225,000 - £235,000

This larger than average two bedroom top floor flat is immaculately presented throughout, and is offered with no onward chain. Features include a fully fitted kitchen, refitted bathroom with separate shower, newly fitted carpets, full double glazing and gas central heating. The accommodation has been tastefully decorated in neutral colours and modern fittings. Ready to move into straight away!
The property is situated in a great spot with local shops all on the doorstep. Woodford is a particularly sought after area due to it's excellent schools, transport links and shops and the backdrop of Epping Forest. The Central Line at South Woodford and Woodford Green stations gives easy access to the City, Canary Wharf and West End, and for road users, the M25, M11 and routes into London are conveniently close by. The ever popular George Lane, with its shops and restaurants, is also within easy reach.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A bright and sizeable two double bedroom apartment on the first floor of low rise mid century corner block with outside space. Here you're perfectly perched between the many charms of Wanstead High Street, the vast green escape of Leyton Flats and Eagle Pond, and the transport links of Snaresbrook tube.

Snaresbrook tube station is literally on your doorstep to whisk you directly to Liverpool Street in a mere sixteen minutes, or Tottenham Court Road in twenty five, putting both the City and the West End within half an hour door-to-door. The myriad attractions of Westfield Stratford City shopping city are yours in ten minutes.

If you lived here…

You'll love having everything you need right on your doorstep; you're right in the bustling heart of our ever-popular East London Village here. On the same block alone you'll find a handy newsagent and Lillies of Wanstead to infuse your apartment with perfume and colour whenever the mood strikes. Michelin starred Provender is a fantastic contemporary brasserie, while Bare Brew is an independent coffee shop offering a mouth-watering brunch. Further on and The Duke (winner of a TimeOut favourite pub award) is one of several exciting options on Nightingale Lane and renowned for its annual street party and summer barbecues.

Inside and your immaculate lounge is a huge 210 square feet with gorgeously tranquil green views courtesy of a quintet of windows. Sleekly engineered floorboards flow underfoot, an original tiled fireplace surround is a fine feature and there's plenty of space for dining. You'll find your kitchen sitting opposite; ideal for entertaining. On-trend terracotta hued floor tiling is a feature you may well want to keep, depending on your interior design vision, and you've a white suite of cabinets.

This space is bookended by your two generous double bedrooms. Both come with built-in storage and a wealth of potential; the only limit is your imagination. The bathroom's a bright, appealing space in white and cream with a shower over the tub and floating sink, while lastly your outside space sits to the front. Beautiful bare brick adorned by a riot of colour from thriving pots make this an ideal spot for morning coffee and provides a charming vista from both bedrooms.

What else?

- Local schools are chiefly excellent, with seven primary/secondaries rated 'Good' or better by Ofsted in a one mile radius, including the 'Outstanding' Wanstead Church School, just four minutes' walk.
- Local bus routes from the High Street will whisk you across London day and night with the N55 ferrying you to the newly refurbished Hitchcock Hotel, Leyton, Lea Bridge station, Clapton, Hackney Central station, Hoxton, Old Street and Oxford Street. Handy.
- Bombetta is an Italian restaurant just across the road serving hearty portions of authentic Puglian cuisine. Try the spicy sausage bombetta with courgette fries. This superlative eaterie is sure to become a favourite.

Bedroom (3.44m x 4.04m (11'3" x 13'3"))

Bathroom

Bedroom (2.87m x 4.04m (9'4" x 13'3"))

A word from the owner....

"We have lived in Wanstead since August 1999 and it's a wonderful place. It has interesting shops, a variety of restaurants and pubs and a monthly farmers market. A village feel yet there is a tube station on your doorstep. Safe and convenient and a blessing after a tough day at work or evening out especially if it's raining and no umbrella! Wanstead is thriving. It's on the fringe of Epping Forest, Eagle Pond & park areas provide lovely walks. Modern but with a real community spirit."

detailedDescription:
Situated in the sought after Ennerdale Court, a well presented retirement complex situated just 0.4 miles from Wanstead High Street, this one bedroom apartment is exclusively available for residents aged 55 and over. Surrounded by beautiful, well-maintained communal gardens with seating areas, both communal and visitors parking and within proximity of many bus routes, it is clear why the development proves so popular with residents. The property is fully managed and benefits from an on-site manager with an emergency 24-hour Careline System for out of hour assistance, communal lounge and a guest suite which is perfect for visiting family members.

Situated on the ground floor, the apartment benefits from direct access onto the communal gardens onto a small patio area leading from the via the naturally bright and contemporary lounge/diner. The modern adjoining kitchen also benefits from an additional window allowing natural light and providing ventilation when in use. Like the living room and entrance hall the wooden floor continues into the spacious double bedroom, which not only looks good but is easy to maintain, and there is plenty of room for a triple wardrobe and additional storage if desired. The bathroom benefits from a large, easy access shower cubicle with modern white suite and mirrored cabinet over sink. Additional benefits include a large storage cupboard in the hallway and no onward chain.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A simply superb five bedroom home on a quiet turning in leafy Woodford. A smart 1930s build with whispers of period charm amid the very modern decor, you have an amazing 1600 square foot of living space, not including two unique outbuildings. A beautifully bright property full of delightful surprises.

Your garden hosts a studio annexe as well as an incredible wood cabin, making for astonishing amounts of extra room for storage, guests or where ever else your imagination wanders, without compromising at all on garden space. Indoors there's so much space to play with, so you'll never want for a place for things, from the practical to the precious. To top everything off there's a beautifully converted loft too.

If you lived here…

You'll step into your welcoming hallway and find your double reception to the left, with over 325 square foot of sociable space. A large curved bay window bathes it all in light, and soft grey carpet gives way to grained engineered flooring underfoot (recently newly installed throughout this storey). An exposed brick chimney breast overlooks the dining area, where double doors lead to your 160 square foot kitchen, with central breakfast bar island and grand double oven.

Through sliding aluminium patio doors you'll find your garden, a delightful outside space with large patio. The first of your amazing outbuildings is your cabin of 245 square foot, a perfect place for guests to stay under a wood-panelled ceiling and overlooked by a mature willow tree. Should you wish to use it as a garage you can potentially arrange rear access, as some of your neighbours have done. To the side is your wonderfully flexible studio annexe, over 130 square foot with shower room, WC and its own generous covered deck. Both ideal for all manner of purposes.

Back through your hallway, past a downstairs WC and utility, you'll find your way upstairs. Your shower room is first on the right, with two windows to throw lots of natural light onto the bright white space. There's a modern white suite featuring a Villeroy & Boch sink and Brittany shower. Then you'll come to your first bedroom, 105 square foot with a view of the garden and soft grey carpet underfoot. Your second bedroom is 160 square foot, with another glorious big bay window. Blonde engineered flooring lies underfoot and the walls are pristine white.

Next along is your third bedroom of just over fifty square foot, perfect as a nursery or a study. Up in the converted loft, specifically designed for extra headroom, you'll find two more bedrooms and another shower room, with vanity sink and smart marbled tiles. One bedroom of ninety five square foot sits to the rear, with a Juliet balcony set in a wall of windows to take in the views. Your last bedroom offers 160 square foot of bright space, lit by a pair of skylights. There's plenty of eaves storage here too.

It's just twelve minutes' walk to Woodford Station, where the Central Line will take you to Stratford for shopping at Westfield in another twelve minutes, or to Liverpool Street in just over twenty. All your amenities are close at hand, including a wide range of sports clubs from bowls to cricket and rugby. Drivers will be pleased to find it's barely over three miles to the North Circular and the M11, making getting around or out of town a cinch. As for green spaces, thirteen minutes on foot sees you into Roding Valley Park on the banks of the River Roding.

What else?

- Your new local is the Rose & Crown, a proper pub with a superlative new seasonal menu including vegan options.
- Schools rated 'Outstanding' nearby include Ray Lodge Primary and Churchfields Junior.
- If you've got a furry member of the family, a lovely dog park is eleven minutes away, and excellent local trainer Walkies With Una is nearby too if you ever need any help.

Ensuite

A word from the owners..."Our home has many wonderful memories and has given many people pleasure or temporary accommodation over the years. We have hosted many large celebrations in our garden, up to 100 people, however the noise does not carry to the front area so never had any issues with neighbours. Parking for guests could be found in surrounding areas. Similarly internally, with the solid structure downstairs walls we never hear our neighbours nor noise carrying from the ground floor to the top. We had our Scottish family and friends and lots of visitors from around the world benefitting from our large accommodation and perfect location hence why we added further external accommodation. WiFi access has been installed inside to the top of the house and out to the chalet/ bothy - excellent fast service throughout. The street is very quiet both with a mixture of long term elderly owners and new family’s with young children with very little houses being rented to tenants, unaware of any HMO property’s. The children’s parks and facilities are very close and safe allowing them to walk or bike themselves. My kids did local paper rounds in the morning, a very safe area. Then as they got older part time and summer jobs were found easily around the area.

Latterly my husband and two boys worked in central, I don which they found the central line one of the best tube lines for access, comfort ability and speed. The supermarkets are both in walking distance and Waitros is in driving distance. Excellent restaurants and coffee shops in walking distance. Excellent walking oathyps and access to the forest close by. A wonderful place to bring up young children. For me, I raised teenagers who managed to safely access all sports facilities and their excellent school Davenant by bus. There is an easy frequent bus service to throughout north and east London and Walthamstow Central as well as tube service and trains from Stratford to throughout England. Two excellent acute hospitals very close; Whipps and Northmid with private Holly house also close. Excellent doctors surgery’s and dentist in walking distance in Woodford. We will be sad to move from this wonderful family home but will continue to live around this area as love it so much."

Being sold with the added benefit of no onward chain, Churchill Estates are favoured to offer for sale this attractive three double bedroom Victorian home arranged over three floors. title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Contemporary 4 bedroom detached chalet bungalow with off-street parking and large private garden. On a quiet residential street in South Woodford’s highly desirable Firs Estate.

The house has an attractive frontage and driveway surrounded by mature trees and plants, a wide and well-lit porch and entrance hall leads you directly into the heart of the house where the architectural design creates a range of stylish living spaces over 2.5 floors.

The ground floor comprises five extremely versatile main areas; the two rooms at the front of the house (reconfigured bedrooms) are currently being utilised as a fully-equipped cinema and a music room with home workspace. There is also a shower room and WC off the main hall. At the rear of the house you will find an abundance of space for dining and entertaining with an open-plan living area that overlooks a modern feature garden and a bespoke kitchen which has been put together with natural stone, wood and steel and is a real joy for cooking enthusiasts.

The décor throughout the ground floor is made up of light paintwork and natural-wood tones and a blend of double glazed and glass-brick windows at the front and side of the property, along with large bi-fold glass doors at the rear ensure that the house is provided with plenty of natural light.

An elegant and well designed staircase in the centre of the property leads initially to the mid-floor or mezzanine where you will find the study and then on to the first floor where it forms a gallery overlooking the entrance.

The first floor comprises two further bedrooms that offer fantastic views of the garden and of the attractive tree-lined street, a sizeable family bathroom with bathtub and shower, a utility room and a large amount of useful storage space in the eaves.

This floor continues the natural concept of the house in providing bright and spacious areas, high ceilings and well-thought out window positions and lighting, this floor with carpeted bedrooms for comfort.

The garden provides a great layout for al fresco dining and entertaining with multi-level decking stepping-out directly from the house. A large lawn peppered with ornamental features, an abundance of mature foliage & trees and further outbuilding and greenhouse at the rear.

This lifestyle property has been configured to provide a tranquil setting and to offer comfort and enjoyment in equal measure.

Just a short distance to Snaresbrook and South Woodford Stations this is an excellent opportunity, not to be missed; please contact Bairstow Eves Wanstead to arrange a viewing.

detailedDescription:
Located in a quiet cul-de-sac, Osprey Close is a short 0.6 Miles from Wanstead High Street and Snaresbrook Station (0.6 Miles) in addition to being a similarly short walk to South Woodford Station and George Lane Shops (0.7 Miles) making it perfectly placed for commuters. In addition, there is a small parade of shops a short 0.3 Miles from the property including a handy corner shop and outstanding local sushi bar and fish restaurant.

The property itself is a stunning example of a really well presented, purpose built apartment, with the added benefit of direct access to the communal gardens by virtue of it being situated on the ground floor. Immediately upon entering the large lounge/diner gives an impressive first impression and opens by way of double doors to an equally impressive contemporary kitchen. The layout to the kitchen area allows for a good range of storage including integrated dishwasher, fridge-freezer, induction hob, oven and washing machine, whilst the glass panelled double doors concertina back to provide a semi-open plan layout for entertaining or can be closed to create two separate spaces without restricting natural light.

There are two bedrooms, the larger of which enjoys a great deal of storage space with a large, fitted wardrobe, a single bedroom with double doors onto the communal gardens and a contemporary bathroom with large walk-in shower. The property further benefits from a long lease, two allocated parking spaces and no onward chain.

Excellent first time buyer or investment opportunity! Two bedroom first floor Victorian flat located close to Ilford Station and Town Centre along with multiple restaurants, supermarkets, shops and within Ofsted outstanding rated schools!

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
An elegantly appointed and sleekly spacious three bedroom apartment on the ground floor of a substantial Victorian semi-detached, surrounded by the vast natural greenery of Epping Forest and a brief stroll from Wanstead High Street. You have side access, off street parking, cellar and secluded rear garden.

At 120 square feet, your cellar space is ideal for simple storage or some exciting further development; we've seen spaces like this turned into everything from home gyms to Tiki bars.

If you lived here

Your first stop will be your 150 square foot front lounge, blessed with the generous proportions and high ceilings of the period. Light floods in from the large bay window. Next door is your first bedroom, a substantial double of 140 square feet with a jet black vintage mantelpiece and direct access to the garden. Out here your pebbled side return blooms onto a length of lawn replete with thriving shrubs and mature greenery.

Bedroom two's a generous single ideal for a child or home office, with plenty of fitted floor to ceiling storage. Moving further in your bathroom's tranquil in pastel mint green and white, while your kitchen impresses in contrasting black and whites, with low key mosaic splashback and a handy breakfast bar. Finally your third bedroom is a beautifully bright double, courtesy of French doors opening directly onto the garden.

Outside and the vast wild greenery of Epping Forest starts just five minutes from your front door. A fifteen minute stroll brings you to Hollow Ponds, made famous by local boy Damon Albarn, where you can hire a row boat and explore the waterways accompanied by friendly ducks. Round off the perfect day with a drink at The Hitchcock Hotel, recently reimagined by the team behind The Ivy, and the ideal spot to watch the sun set over the trees.

What else?
- As noted you have off street parking, and drivers will be pleased to know the North Circular is less than five minutes away.
- Wanstead High Street, the heart of this bustling East London village, is just a half mile on foot and full of independent cafes, stores and gastropubs, plus artisanal produce suppliers and even a classic Pie & Mash Shop. Wanstead tube will whisk you directly to the City and West End via the Central line.
- You have fourteen primary/secondary schools less than a mile away on foot, all rated 'Good' or 'Outstanding' by Ofsted.

Just 18 minutes direct from Liverpool Street, the long High Street nevertheless has a real village feel with a great range of fine pubs and restaurants.

Still somewhat off the beaten track, Wanstead is a place of broad peaceful avenues, open green spaces and generously proportioned properties.

With prices still amongst the capital's more affordable, Wanstead is proving a popular destination for those looking to upscale and first time buyers alike.

detailedDescription:
A stunning family home which has been extended and refurbished to offer bright and spacious living with excellent local amenities and tube line to the city.

Location

Kings Avenue offers many key selling points that underpins its value and popularity with buyers looking to secure a home in this highly sought after area.

Everyday shopping facilities and amenities can be found on the Broadway being only 0.3 of a mile away and includes a Sainsburys, deli and grocery store, coffee shops, bars and restaurants and a dry cleaners. Its here that you will also find Woodford tube station offering a swift journey into Liverpool Street.

The choice of local schooling at state and private level is one of the main reasons buyers choose to live in this area. Schools include Bancroft & Chigwell Private School, Woodford Wells, Woodford County High School For Girls and Woodford Green Prep School.

For outdoors pursuits you are spoilt for choice given that Knighton Woods and Epping Forest are on your doorstep. Walkers, runners, mountain bikers, horse riders and excitable dogs are a popular sight in Epping Forest. Or for those that prefer a more stationary hobby, why not catch up with family and friends at the Kings Oak Pub or one of the delightful tea huts.

Description

A truly stunning family home which has been sympathetically extended and totally refurbished by the current owners.

The accommodation comprises to the ground floor a large entrance hallway with useful storage provided underneath the stairs, a large and bright living room, cloakroom, dining area, a substantial utility room with ample storage, and a magnificent kitchen family room. The generous open plan kitchen diner is the epicentre for modern living creating a sociable space and a pleasurable cooking environment. Natural light floods the space through bi fold doors and ceiling lantern.

To the first floor are three very good sized bedrooms all with built in storage and en suites. The main bedroom features a handy dressing area and a wonderful en suite bathroom with double sinks.

To the second floor and there are two further bedrooms, a family shower room and eaves storage.

Exterior

There is a large paved driveway to the front of the house and gated side access. To the rear is a substantial garden measuring an impressive 119' long and 39' wide facing south east. It is partly laid to lawn and includes a large patio.

Square Footage: 2992 sq ft

title: 5 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription: *Guide Price £775,000 - £800,000* This charming four bedroom, Victorian family home offers a wealth of period features balanced with a contemporary finish for modern family living. The property is ideally nestled on a quiet, residential street and yet is within walking distance of the Woodford High Road, Broadway amenities and underground station. The ground floor comprises of a bright and airy hallway leading onto the through lounge awash with natural light and oozing features from the bay window and period fireplace to the high ceilings. Further down the hallway leads to a guest W⁄C and the extended modern kitchen with space for dining, underfloor heating and a back room ideal to capture the summer afternoons or have kids play whilst making dinner. Double doors lead to the sun trap garden with back patio area ideal for entertaining and side return perfect for storage. The first floor offers three double bedrooms with the master bedroom spanning the width of the house as well as benefiting from a built in wardrobe and a family bathroom with underfloor heating. The second floor is home to a fourth bedroom awash with light and an en-suite shower room. With Woodford Central Line Station only a short walk away and parents being well catered for with outstanding schools close by as well as the beautiful area with forests, lakes, country parks and open green spaces this really is a charming home ready for its next family.

address: Royston Parade, Royston Gardens, Ilford IG1
detailedDescription:
Madison Fox take great pleasure in bringing to the market this well presented and impressively extended six/seven bedroom semi-detached gated family home situated on a popular turning in North Ilford. The property has been carefully arranged to have separate living spaces but can also be opened to be a fantastic entertainment space.

The property benefits from a porch leading to the entrance hall and the large formal lounge. There is a separate dining room which extends to the open plan L shaped fully fitted kitchen and family room and a conservatory with guest cloakroom. The first floor landing has been extended into what can be a seventh bedroom and provides and impressive office space. There are four further bedrooms on this floor one of which has an en-suite shower and a family bathroom. The second floor provides two more bedrooms and a shower room.

Outside to the front is off street parking behind secure electric gates and the low maintenance rear garden has a raised patio area and a fantastic garden room with separate storage.

The property is just a short walk to Valentines's Park and the huge choice of shops cafe's and restaurants available at Gants Hill and 'The Exchange' Ilford. A choice of Central Line stations and Ilford Overground are all within easy access as is A406, A12 & M11 motorway. Ilford is perfectly located for a great choice of primary and secondary schools both private and state.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
This characterful home is positioned on the sought after Chester Road, conveniently placed for all local amenities. Both Wanstead and Snaresbrook stations are a short walk away (0.2 and 0.8 miles respectively), as well as a number of nurseries, primary and secondary schools and Wanstead Park (0.5 miles), which is the perfect place to go for long walks or cycle rides throughout the year.

Once inside, the space and character of the house can be fully appreciated.
A welcoming entrance hallway with ceiling coving, dado rail and carved balustrading serves the two reception rooms, both with exposed floorboards. An elegant sitting room features a large bay window, ensuring the room is flooded by natural light, whilst the fireplace with pretty tiled inset gives the room a cosy feel on colder days.
To the rear of the property you will find the dining room which enjoys garden views from the French doors. The kitchen is fitted with a range of Shaker style cabinets complemented by contrasting work surfaces which provide a breakfast bar for casual dining. A handy guest cloakroom completes the ground floor accommodation.

On the first floor there are four bedrooms, the principal being a bright and spacious double, the second boasting an original cast iron fireplace whilst the fourth bedroom lends itself well to use as a study if required. The family bathroom is fully tiled and fitted with a white suite.

Externally the rear garden commences with a patio area which offers plenty of room for a table and chairs. The garden is mainly laid to lawn with shrub borders.

Transport links include both Wanstead and Snaresbrook Central Line Stations whilst the M11, M25 and North Circular are just a short drive away.

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
This 4 bedroom detached property is located in the exclusive Harts Grove development. This beautiful family home is in a tranquil setting within a quiet cul-de-sac and off street parking and garage. Close to popular schooling and short walk to Epping Forest and station. Excellent condition throughout.

Guide Price £1,350,000 - £1,400,000

Situated in one of Woodford Green's premier locations is this eye catching 4 bedroom detached house. Harts Grove is a popular well maintained development located perfectly for easy access to all what Woodford has to offer. This property ticks all the boxes for stunning family living and is set in this tranquil setting. Carlina Gardens is widely known as one of Harts Grove exclusive cul-de-sac's and properties within this location are rare to the market.

This attractive house is in stunning condition throughout and has been well maintained by its current owners. The accommodation comprises of a reception hall, lounge leading to a dining room which can be split to suit, study, ground floor W.C, luxury fitted kitchen diner with utility room. The first floor is just as big offering 4 double bedrooms, luxury bathroom and modern en suite shower room off the master bedroom.
The exterior is truly stunning with its attractive frontage with mature shrubs and trees, side access, off street parking and double garage with electric door. The rear garden is on wide plot and is very secluded where you can enjoy those summer days.

If transport links to London is important, Woodford Central Line Station is a short walk away; also giving access to Westfield Stratford City and into the city. Harts Grove is a very leafy and green residential area with the added benefit of being close to Epping Forest, Knighton Wood & Lake which is a popular location for enjoying a scenic walk, run or bike ride.
If you want to grab a fine coffee-to-go, there is a selection of splendid cafes and patisseries on your doorstep along The High Road and The Broadway – a parade of shops that includes restaurants, an organic and vegan-friendly deli, and other amenities. Transport links are excellent with M25 & M11 junctions are also within easy reach.

We find a lot of people move to Woodford for its stunning green spaces and outstanding schools. Just to name a few private and states schools close by are Avon House Preparatory School, Wells Primary School, Woodford Prep and Bancroft's.

Externally, to the front there is off street parking and a single garage. The rear garden is particular feature of the house.

title: 1 bed maisonette for sale

detailedDescription:
A smart and spacious two bedroom apartment on the second floor of a contemporary development nestled in our sought-after Nightingale Estate. Here you're blessed with a beautiful communal garden and as well as being within easy reach of the plentiful green spaces, high street and transport links of Wanstead.

Snaresbrook tube station is half a mile on foot and will get you directly to Liverpool Street in sixteen minutes, or Tottenham Court Road in twenty five. Drivers, meanwhile, have off street parking and can be on the North Circular in less than ten minutes.

If you lived here

You'll be welcoming guests into your expansive 255 square foot dual aspect lounge with sleekly engineered timber laminate underfoot, farrow and ball ammonite walls and an absolute wealth of space in which to dine and recline. Your quadruple set of windows frame glorious views over the leafy grounds and the statuesque red brick Victorian architecture beyond.

Next door and the kitchen comes with more green views, a gleaming white tiled backsplash and elegant suite of cream cabinets, while your bathroom's a gorgeous contemporary space in light pewter with a shower over the tub. Your master bedroom's a generous double of over 105 square feet with a luxury statement wall and built-in storage, and bedroom two's a versatile seventy square feet. Lastly, your communal garden's lush lawn and mature foliage are wonderfully tranquil, set as you are on a no through road with minimal traffic.

Outside, Wanstead High Street is less than a half mile on foot. The bustling heart of this popular East London village, it's home to a wide range of independent cafes, gourmet pubs and independent produce suppliers including a butchers and fishmongers. Bare Brew was set up by Gemma and Lisa and serves up incredible brunches in a dog-friendly environment, while award-winning Sumo Fresh's Gindara grilled black cod inside out roll is out of this world. Closer to home and on your very street you can support local entrepreneur Akansha by indulging in her mouth-watering range of homemade sweet treats in The Better Batter Bakery.

What else?

- Parents will be pleased to know you have eleven primary/secondary schools just in a one mile radius, all rated 'Good' or better by Ofsted, five of which have been deemed 'Outstanding'.
- For your new local we have to recommend The Duke for its delicious food, a wide range of events, real ales and fine wines. Just a seven minute walk away. Don't miss the other nightlife options on Nightingale Lane either. It's a great spot to have around the corner.
- Leyton Flats and Eagle Pond are an eleven minute jaunt for fresh air, picnics and reaching fitness goals. You can also hop onto the W12 bus route here to be whisked to the myriad delights of Walthamstow in mere minutes.

Reception Room (5.98m x 3.97m (19'7" x 13'0"))

Kitchen (2.08m x 2.96m (6'9" x 9'8"))

Bedroom (2.77m x 3.58m (9'1" x 11'8"))

Bathroom (2.08m x 2.18m (6'9" x 7'1"))

Bedroom (2.77m x 2.36m (9'1" x 7'8"))

A word from the owner....

"I have loved living here for the past 12 years, the building and street is safe and quiet.

The communal garden is great all year round, especially over the past year.The flat bathroom was refurbished in 2019 including paint and new heating.

Easy access to both Wanstead and Snaresbrook station gets you into central London within 30 minutes. The high street is an excellent mix of chain and local business, with a monthly farmers market. There is a great community spirit with a yearly art trail and Christmas tree lighting amongst many things. I will miss being so close to the high street many offerings of coffee and lunch from Bare Brew and The Larder."

detailedDescription:
Book online today 24/7 at
*** £1,350,000***

We are delighted to offer to the market this spacious, light filled Five Bedroom Victorian Mid Terrace House, situated in this sought-after road in Wanstead Village a few minutes walk from the high street, village green and tube station
You will be immediately impressed as you approach the property with its striking brick frontage and period features. The property has been completely extended & refurbished to an exceptionally high standard throughout to make it a truly stunning and unique family property.

Comprising of a through lounge with period features and working fire places, a beautiful bespoke new kitchen with aluminium doors leading into the professionally designed secluded rear garden.
On the first floor, you will enjoy 3 large double bedrooms (with the master bedroom spanning the width of the house and having a working fire place) and a spacious and bright family bathroom.
The loft has been converted & boasts 2 further bedrooms and a separate bathroom.

This property has been beautifully restored by the current owners & offers a plethora of traditional period features in keeping with the style of the house.
Beautifully presented throughout, this property would make an ideal family home and so an internal viewing is highly recommended.
Please book a viewing online today to avoid missing out!
*** please click on the brochure link to arrange your viewing ***

Location

The property is well located and close to an array of local amenities including the village green and high street with its array of alfreco cafes, restaurants, popular bars and beautiful gastropubs, shops such as marks and spencers all just a short distance away.

Transport links are easily accessible with both Wanstead & Snaresbrook central line stations each being just a few minutes walk away which will take you directly to Liverpool Street in under 20 minutes .

The A12, A406 North Circular and the M11 are also just a short distance away.

It also has many sought after nursery, primary and secondary schools all under a mile away which are rated Good-Outstanding in their most recent Ofted reports.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

address: Devereux Court, Snakes Lane West, Woodford Green IG8
detailedDescription:
A bright and spacious south facing one bedroom retirement apartment on the ground floor with a patio area

Devereux Court

Devereux Court has been designed and constructed for modern living. The apartments boast underfloor heating throughout, Sky/Sky+ connection points in living rooms, and secure camera entry system with use with a standard TV.

The dedicated House Manager is on site during their working hours to take care of the running of the development. There's no need to worry about the burden of maintenance costs as the service charge covers the cost of all external maintenance, gardening and landscaping, external window cleaning, buildings insurance, water rates and security systems.

All energy costs of the homeowners lounge and other communal areas are also covered in the service charge. For your peace of mind the development has camera door entry and 24-hour emergency call systems, should you require assistance. The Homeowners' lounge provides a great space to socialise with friends and family.

It is a condition of purchase that residents must meet the age requirement of 60 years or over.

Entrance Hall

Front door with spy hole leads to the entrance hallway. The 24-hour Tunstall emergency response pull cord is located in the hall. Light switches, smoke detector and security door entry system. Door leading to a storage cupboard and all doors leading to the living room, bedroom and bathroom.

Living Room

A well presented lounge benefitting from a double glazed french door that leads onto a beautiful patio area, with ample room for a table and chairs, . Electric fire and surround providing a great focal point. TV and telephone points. Two ceiling lights. Raised electric power sockets. Part glazed door leads into the separate kitchen.

Kitchen

Fitted with a range of modern wall and base units with a roll top worktop and ceramic tiling above. Built-in electric oven with four ringed hob above, tiled splash back and extractor hood. Stainless steel sink with mixer tap sits in front of the double glazed window. Fitted integrated fridge and freezer. Free standing washer/ dryer. Under unit lighting, ceiling spotlights. Ceramic floor tiling.

Bedroom

This bedroom is very well presented and benefits from a large double glazed window. Central ceiling light. TV and telephone point. Mirror fronted sliding doors to a built in wardrobe.

Bathroom

Fully tiled bathroom with a bath, shower and a support rail. WC. Vanity unit with inset sink and mirror above. Heated towel rail. Emergency pull-cord. Floor tiles.

Service Charge (Breakdown)

• Cleaning of communal windows
• Water rates for communal areas and apartments
• Electricity, heating, lighting and power to communal areas
• 24 hour emergency call system
• Upkeep of gardens and grounds
• Repairs and maintenance to the interior and exterior communal areas
• Contingency fund including internal and external redecoration of communal areas
• Buildings insurance

The service charge does not cover external costs such as your Council Tax, electricity or TV. To find out more about service charges please contact your property consultant or house manager.

Car Parking (Permit Scheme)

The fee is usually £250 per annum. Permits are available on a first come, first served basis. Please check with your house manager on site for availability

Lease Information

Lease Length: 125 years from 1st January 2010
Ground Rent: £495

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Plot 378
3 bedroom house
£125,000 for a 25% share of £500,000 and a deposit as low as £6,250 and a minimum income of £60,897.

What is shared ownership?
Under the shared ownership scheme you part-own and part-rent your home, making it possible for first-time buyers and families to get on the property ladder.
The minimum share you can purchase is 25% and the maximum is 75%. You will usually pay a mortgage on the part you own and a subsidised rent on
the part you don't own. Over time, you can increase the share you own until you eventually own 100%

L&Q at Oaklands Hamlet
The development combines its exceptional collection of 2 bedroom houses with breath-taking parkland, creating an attractive destination for a variety of lifestyles. With easy access into London, it is ideally located for making the most of the city and you will enjoy coming home to the peaceful tree-lined greenery. Surrounded by a total of 53 acres of countryside and two grand golf courses, this exciting new community offers much-needed breathing space and a relaxing atmosphere perfect for all walks of life. These traditional but stylish homes have a desirable specification throughout, access to private or communal gardens and include parking.

View our pricelist for further details.

Past the beautifully landscaped entrance, the homes at Oaklands Hamlet welcome you into a communal village green, with protected wildlife and mature trees dotted across the area. The traditional homes boast an excellent specification, creating a sought-after destination with a beautiful landscaped approach. The development combines its exceptional collection of apartments and houses with breathtaking parkland, creating the perfect destination for a variety of lifestyles. With easy access into London, it is ideally located for making the most of the city and you will enjoy coming home to the tranquil tree-lined greenery.

Outdoors
Rooted through Oaklands Hamlet is a sense of nature, with greenery on all sides of the development and a tree-lined entrance. Alongside the golf courses, Hainault Forest Country Park neighbours the development, offering 300 acres for fishing, boating, and enjoying nature.

Leisure
Leisure and sports go hand in hand at Oaklands Hamlet. Relax at the local Hainault Golf Club across its two courses, or visit Redbridge Sports and Leisure Centre in Hainault to keep fit.

Education
There are plenty of options for schooling nearby. The Clockhouse Primary School, a charming educational establishment, for older students there is The Forest Academy, The Warren School, and Bower Park Academy, and just under 6 miles away is Redbridge College.

Viewings
For those who would like to and are able to visit us, the Show Home is now open on an appointment-only basis, with extra measures in place to ensure your wellbeing. Please call us to book your appointment. If you would prefer to speak to our Sales Team from your own home, they are still on hand and can conduct appointments via phone, email and by virtual tour. *We are taking extra precautions to ensure the health and wellbeing of our customers, staff and members of the public.

*Terms and conditions apply

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
**Guide Price £700,000 - £750,000**

Madison Fox take great pleasure in bringing to the market one of the finest and unique apartments located within the heart of Repton Park. This stunning property is brought to you in 'show home' condition and has amazing character including high ceilings, individual cornicing, large internal doors, wooden floors and sash windows with bespoke shutters just to name a few.

The hallway has been thoughtfully configured with storage, a utility cupboard and a guest shower/cloakroom. The premier bedroom has fully fitted wardrobes and a bathroom that can only be described as 'spectacular' and there is a second double bedroom currently being used as a TV room/office. The beautiful fully fitted kitchen/breakfast room opens to the dining room and the separate lounge has doors leading to the raised patio with access to the manicured communal grounds.

This amazing apartment comes with two allocated parking spaces included one in the underground secure car park.

This property truly is 'To Die For' and we would encourage an early inspection to save disappointment.

Repton Park is located within easy reach of Woodford Central Line Stations which offer easy access into London. Also within close proximity is the ever popular parade of shops on High Road (Woodford) and Brook Parade (Chigwell) with their comprehensive range of shops, boutiques, eateries and restaurants. Further local amenities include, Virgin Active Premier Club Repton Park and Tescos Superstore. The area offers a range of access to primary and secondary schools, both private and state. By car M25 (junction 26) and M11 (Junction 5 - Southbound) are within easy reach.

Originally Claybury Hospital, Repton Park was sympathetically developed by Crest Nicholson in conjunction with English Heritage and the London Wildlife Trust, converting the original buildings and adding new houses and apartments. Arguably the local areas most prestigious development further benefits include on site CCTV, 24hr concierge service, Virgin Active spa, gym and bistro, allocated and visitor parking and approximately 235 acres of landscaped grounds.

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Being sold with No Onward Chain, Churchill Estates are delighted to bring to market this wonderfully unique two double bedroom, Grade II Listed Terraced House.

Upon entry you are welcomed by a generously sized entrance hall boasting two large storage cupboards. To your right you find a well-equipped fully fitted kitchen with modern integrated appliances. Onwards you have a substantial living area, flooded with natural light through an ornate floor to ceiling original sash window and patio door leading out to a well maintained South West facing communal garden.

The upstairs comprises of two comfortable double bedrooms with breathtakingly high ceilings, a fully tiled family bathroom and the loft space ideal for additional storage. Further benefits include gas central heating, private front garden and two allocated parking spaces.

Not only that but you are within walking distance to both Snaresbrook and South Woodford Central Line Station's and Wanstead High Street with an array of amenities ranging from local bakeries, bars and boutique shops.

For more information or to arrange an appointment to view, please contact the office at your earliest convenience to avoid disappointment.

title: 2 bed bungalow for sale

detailedDescription:
Once inside this charming home, the spacious rooms and well presented accommodation can be fully appreciated.

A welcoming entrance hallway retains some original character which includes the picture rail, dado rail and carved balustrading. A deep under stairs cupboard provides useful storage whilst the fully tiled guest cloakroom is handy for guests. There are two reception rooms, an elegant sitting room with patio doors enjoying garden views and a second reception featuring a deep square bay window. The superb 28' kitchen/dining room is the hub of the home and is fitted with a range of white high gloss cabinets, complemented by solid wood work surfaces. A ceiling lantern ensures the dining area is flooded by natural light.

On the first floor there are four bedrooms, the principal has an en-suite shower whilst the third has an en-suite cloakroom. The family bathroom is fitted with a white suite and completes the accommodation. At present the loft area is carpeted and used for storage, the windows to front and rear allowing in plenty of light.

Externally a well maintained garden of 75' approx. With secure side access commences with a patio area, perfect for entertaining, and is mainly laid to lawn with apple trees and shrub borders.

A garden shed is handy for storing garden tools whilst the summerhouse with shower room lends itself well to use as a gym or home/office. The driveway serves an integral garage.

The house is perfect for commuters being just a stroll away from South Woodford Central Line Station.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this spacious, bright and airy 3 bedroom end of terrace house with further scope to extend subject to planning subject. Located Closely to the A12 just off Horns Road and walking distance to both Barkingside and Newbury Park Central Line Stations.

The accommodation is accessed via front door leading into the hallway. To the front you have a ground floor cloakroom to one side and an open plan reception with a spacious bay window to the front. To the rear you have space for dining with double glazed sliding doors leading into the garden. A newly fitted bespoke kitchen is also located to the rear of the ground floor.

Stairs to the first floor landing lead you into 3 good sized rooms with the main bedroom benefitting with fitted wardrobes. The family bathroom suite is also located on the first floor landing.

The front of the property provides off street parking for 4 cars! The rear garden is mainly laid to lawn and can also be accessed via a secure gate to the side of the house.

This unique opportunity would suite both investor/developers and first time buyers as this end of terrace house has huge potential waiting to be transformed in to a dream family home - Act fast!

Location

The location is perfect - Situated closely to the A12, just off the popular Horns Road in this sought-after location, Newbury Park Station & Barkingside Station (Central Line -Zone 4) are both a circa a 10 minutes walk away. The A12 provides easy access to the A406 and M11 roads for those that commute via car. Local bus services are within walking distance providing access towards several different locations including Gants Hill, Barkingside, Ilford and Romford Town centres. The area is full of parks, local amenities, supermarkets and Newbury Park retail parks are just round the corner making it an ideal property for those with kids, first time buyers or an investor.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

address: Eaton Court, High Road, South Woodford E18
detailedDescription:
A fine example of London apartment living, here you have a brilliantly bright and spacious suite of rooms atop a contemporary designer development on the top floor with commanding views over the trees and rooftops of Woodford. The social hub of George Lane is just over the road, its bars and gastropubs on your doorstep.

Fixtures and fittings are held to an immaculate standard throughout, with high end integrated kitchen appliances, designer recessed lighting and air conditioning.

If you lived here…

You'll be enjoying the views from your private fourth floor south facing balcony, over 100 square feet of decked outside space, with a part glazed balustrade all the better to enjoy the views over Woodford. The perfect spot for morning coffee or evening glass of wine. Inside, your dual aspect, kitchen/lounge totals around 300 square feet and is every bit as impressive, dual aspect and flooded with natural light.

Light dove grey hardwood flows underfoot, with a variety of recessed and suspended designer lighting overhead. The kitchen area is smartly finished with a sleek white suite of fitted cabinets and complementary worksurfaces including a gorgeous breakfast bar. Elsewhere both your bedrooms are substantial doubles and every bit as handsome as you'd expect, while your bathroom gleams in floor to ceiling designer tiling and features a rainfall shower over the tub.

Outside and South Woodford tube station is just at the other end of George Lane, a mere eight minutes walk. Sat in zone four on the Central line, you have regular, speedy eighteen minute connections to Liverpool Street, with Tottenham Court Road just another nine minutes away. Closer to home, the shopping and leisure colossus that is Stratford's Westfield shopping centre is less than twenty minutes away, door to door.

What else?

- A large skylight illuminates your wide hallway and its wealth of incidental space. There's also plenty of fitted storage here, and still more in each bedroom. A welcome addition to any London apartment.
- Among George Lane's impressive array of day to day amenities are locals' favourite gastropub The George, and the longstanding art deco landmark that is the Odeon cinema.
- The development surrounds gated communal gardens, so you have the perfect retreat from urban life right outside your front door.

Kitchen/Reception Room (5.45m x 6.42m (17'10" x 21'0"))

Balcony (1.94m x 6.49m (6'4" x 21'3"))

Bedroom (2.47m x 4.74m (8'1" x 15'6"))

Bedroom (3.13m x 4.15m (10'3" x 13'7"))

Bathroom

A word from the owner....

"I have had a great time in this apartment, which is in an excellent location in South Woodford. The high street is only a stone's throw away, with accessible transport links, but at the same time the living space provides quiet and tranquility. In the apartment, the skylight and bi-folding doors really maximise natural light, and the large south facing balcony effectively doubles the living room area, which is great especially in the summer months."

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Doorsteps are pleased to market this two bedroom, second floor flat in the Barkingside area of Ilford.

The flat consists of two bedrooms, an open plan kitchen, dual-aspect lounge with a private balcony and a spacious bathroom. Internal doors cater for a wheelchair and there is ample built-in storage.

The property is located on the top floor in a secure, self-contained building for residents over 55. It offers an accessible lift, plenty of parking spaces in the gated car park for both residents and visitors, secure-door entry system, a communal balcony, maintained gardens and use of green spaces on The Barnardo’s Village site.

Located on the ground floor of the building is a dedicated drying room, a suitcase cupboard and a guest suite with two beds and en suite facilities available for hire. Further shared facilities are accessible in the neighbouring block.

The local area provides plenty of amenities including nearby supermarkets, high-street shops, doctors’ surgeries and much more. There are also excellent transport links with nearby bus stops and underground stations including Barkingside, Fairlop and Newbury Park, as well as easy access to the A12, A13, A406 and M11 for M25.

The property is managed by Anchor Hanover as one of their retirement housing schemes and they will retain one quarter ownership of the flat. A part-time support manager and 24 hour emergency response call system are included in the service charge.

Early viewing is advised.

title: 2 bed maisonette for sale

detailedDescription:
A unique opportunity to acquire this spacious Edwardian terraced house boasting six bedrooms, two receptions, and an open plan kitchen diner! Excellently located just off Benton Road and within a five minute walk to Seven Kings Station. This family home also comes into the Seven Kings High Schools catchment area.

The accommodation is accessed via the front garden providing off street parking for two cars minimum. The front door with its fine carved masonry arch leads you into a wide and high hallway. On the ground floor you have two reception to the front and two bedrooms to the rear. Along with a ground floor shower room and separate w.c. The rear of the ground floor has been extended by 6 meters accommodating a lengthy bespoke kitchen.

Stairs to the first floor landing provide you with three bedrooms and a cloakroom. There is currently a kitchen where the first floor bathroom used to be, however this will be removed prior to the sale of the house. The loft has also been converted into one large bedroom with an en suite.

The front garden has been paved with concrete slabs providing easy maintenance and off street parking for a minimum of two cars. The rear garden is mainly laid to lawn boarded with concrete paving and flower beds and has a fully powered outbuilding to the rear.

A special key feature includes the property having a huge investment appeal. The property of course benefits with gas central heating, double glazed windows and off street parking.

Location

The location is perfect - Situated just off Benton Road and parallel to Aldborough Road South in this sought-after location, local shops, supermarkets and restaurants are found at the top of the road. Access to Seven Kings Station and High Road is within a 5 minutes walk away. Ilford Town Centre is also close by. The A406, A12, A13 and the M11 roads are within comfortable distance for those who commute via car. Another benefit also includes the property being close to local parks and schools just round the corner making it an ideal property for those with kids, someone looking for a large family home or an investor.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

detailedDescription:
Viewing day 10th July | By Appointment

Charming Victorian 2 bedroom end-of-terrace house with garden close to Wanstead Station and High Street.

The ground floor comprises a spacious front living room with bay window and original cast iron fireplace, a bright lounge/dining room with integrated storage cupboards (under the stairs) and dual-aspect fitted kitchen at the rear or the property overlooking the garden. The garden is accessed via the kitchen, is low maintenance and provides a great spot for outdoor dining and entertaining. The ground floor has wooden flooring throughout with tiles to the kitchen.

The first floor offers two double bedrooms (the front bedroom is the larger of the two with feature fireplace) and very large family bathroom with tub & shower. The staircase, landing and bedrooms are carpeted and the bathroom is tiled.

There is an opportunity (subject to planning permission) for a second floor loft conversion to create further rooms if required
This family home is a very short work from Wanstead High Street, the heart of a vibrant East London Village that is bustling with cafes and restaurants. Within the catchment area for several primary schools and Wanstead High secondary school and just 10 minutes walk from the splendid Wanstead Park.

Local Central Line underground stations are Wanstead (2 mins / 0.1mi), Snaresbrook and Redbridge (both under a mile away).

This freehold property is currently tenanted but available to purchase chain-free please contact Bairstow Eves Wanstead to arrange a viewing.

Upon entering the property, the ground floor comprises of a large reception room with dining area and patio doors that lead to a huge well maintained private garden in excess of 100ft, a fully fitted galley kitchen also with access to the garden. Upstairs to the first floor where there are 3 good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom with bath, WC and hand basin. The house is in good condition throughout and with the added benefit of driveway parking and the potential to extend both in the loft and at the rear makes it a great option for anyone familiar with the area.

The house is located on Grenville Gardens, a popular and highly sought after residential area in the heart of Woodford Green close to all the local shops, restaurants and cafés of the area as well as being close to Woodford Underground Station (Central Line, Zone 4) for easy access into the City. It is also located in the catchment for some of the best schools in the area

A fantastic, three bedroom, terraced house which offers great size living accommodation comprising of large lounge, extended kitchen/family room with double glazed bi-fold doors to the rear garden which is ideal for entertaining. Three good size bedrooms to the first floor along with a family bathroom/WC and a further loft room which would make an ideal guest room, hobby room or home gym. Further benefits include double glazing, gas central heating, off street parking and is priced to sell! Located on the sought after Woods Estate in Clayhall close to Clayhall Park and Gants Hill with its underground station, local shops, bars and restaurants. Please call our sales team for an appointment to view.

landing

double glazed leaded light round bay window to front, laminate flooring, double radiator, power points, coving to ceiling.

Double glazed picture and casement window to rear, single radiator, power points, fitted wardrobes.

landing

front garden

detailedDescription:
Located on popular West Grove is this stunning semi detached 3 bedroom period property. This extended Victorian house has been finished to a excellent standard whilst offering bright and spacious luxury living. Offers a fantastic kitchen diner with views to the rear. Short walk to Woodford Central Line and amenities.

Situated in prime Woodford Green is this spectacular 3 bedroom semi detached extended house. This eye catching period home has been well maintained by its current owners and has been finished to a good standard throughout with a contemporary finish.
The property has been extended to maximise space and has a bright and spacious feel. You can tell as soon as you step foot in the property that the house has been truly loved.

This splendid home offers accommodation over 3 floors and comprises of a 22ft through lounge, ground floor shower room with W.C, 19ft luxury fitted kitchen diner with bi folding doors to a patio area which is perfect for al fresco dining. There are 2 bedrooms on the first floor with modern family bathroom. Located on the top floor is a further double bedroom.
The attraction does not stop there as the property offers stunning views to the rear aspect over open green spaces and beyond.
The garden has been very well maintained with a lawn and patio area, there is also a shed to the rear.

The property truly offers the best of both worlds, being on the cusp of amazing open greens spaces whilst at the same time having all what Woodford has to offer on its door step.

West Grove is a sought after location which is perfect for commuters who travel into London via the Central Line. Woodford station is only a few minutes' walk and goes directly into Liverpool Street and the West End stations. Also close by are shops on Snakes Lane and other local amenities. Ray Lodge Park is a short walk which is a beautiful park for the whole family to enjoy, offers playing areas and tennis courts. Ray Lodge Primary School (Ofsted rated outstanding) are also within close proximity as well as many offer popular schools

title: 3 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Presidential estates are favoured to offer for sale this immaculately presented and well-proportioned three-bedroom, semi-detached family home situated on a quiet residential pocket of Hainault close to all local amenities and Central Line station which has been finished to an exception standard by the current owner and fully refurbished less than three years ago.

The sumptuous space comprises a large entrance providing plenty of storage, a front reception room with an extended bay window overlooking the front garden, a further dining room with Sliding patio doors onto the garden, a modern fitted kitchen with underfloor heating, a further utility room and a modern fitted shower room /guest WC all on the ground floor. First floor there are three spacious bedrooms, and a modern fitted tiled family bathroom with luxury Jacuzzi bath.
The rear garden is beautifully presented and is south facing making it perfect for those sunny days.
There is perfect decked area for guest entertainment or relaxation, along with a strip of soiled space to plant shrubs and plants. To the rear a well-presented patio area perfect for BBQ’s or further entertainment.
The icing on the cake is an outbuilding which would be perfect for an office/study/games room with full electric and router connections with additional two further brick-built storage sheds.

Location

Conveniently positioned for all local amenities and tube station, providing easy access to central London via the Central Line, this property would perfectly suit a family or first-time buyer.

For families- both Coppice Primary (Good Ofsted) and Wells Park School (Outstanding Ofsted) are within easy reach anyone with children of primary age are well served by these local schools. Hainault and Grange Hill Central Line stations are also easily accessible.<br /><br />

detailedDescription:
** Book viewings 24/7 instantly by visiting our website or download our App **

This is a fantastic opportunity to own a rare to the market one bedroom second floor flat located in the popular Eaton Court, High Road, South Woodford

Upon entrance you will be immediately impressed with its modern design & decor

The property is located on the second floor of this modern purpose built development which benefits from its own concierge service! It features a stunning open plan kitchen/reception room measuring an impressive 26'3 x 9'2, a modern three piece bathroom suite and spacious bedroom with fitted wardrobes.

The property overlooks the picturesque communal garden open green spaces and landscaped courtyard which are meticulously cared for

The property is offered to the market with no onward chain

Further benefits include secure entry system and secure underground allocated parking for one car

Location
The property is conveniently close to transport links with South Woodford Station (Central Line) being just 0.4 miles away, which has direct access to the City of London. George Lane High Street is around the corner and offers a wealth of shops and restaurants to suit every palate. There is an eclectic mix of boutique shops alongside the national retailers. There is also a popular Farmers' Market held every Sunday at various locations within the vicinity. Stratford City and Westfield shopping centre are only a short drive away.

Leasehold Information
The owner advises us that the lease has recently been extended and has approx 173 years remaining with the annual service charge and ground rent combined being approx £165 pcm

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. detailedDescription:
A fantastic opportunity to acquire this spacious, bright and airy 5 bedroom detached family house with further potential to extend STPP. Uniquely located 30s from Hainault Forest.

The accommodation is accessed via your own private door leading into the hallway. On the ground floor you have a bright and airy through lounge to the rear, a spacious kitchen diner to the front along with a ground floor w.c. And garage to the front. Stairs to the first floor landing provide you with 4 double bedrooms including an en suite with the main bedroom as well as a family bathroom. Stiars to the second floor lead you to the 5th bedroom again including an en suite shower room.

The property also benefits with gas central heating and newly fitted double glazed windows.

The front of the property provides off street parking for up to 4 cars minimum. The rear garden is larger than average and mainly laid to lawn with concrete paving making it ideal for children and those summer BBQs.

Location

The location is great- Situated just of Romford Road in this sought-after quiet cul-de-sac location; Local schools are within walking distance. Hainault Forest Country Park backs on the the property and is for walks and runs. The A406, A12 and the M11 roads are within comfortable distance for those who commute via car. Local bus services are close by providing access in to Hainault, Barkingside and Romford. Furthermore, Grange Hill and Hainault Stations (Central Line) are also within a 10 minutes bus journey.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

address: Aldborough Road South, Seven Kings, London IG3
detailedDescription:
Situated in the heart of Seven Kings and popular Aldborough Road South is this attractive, fully double glazed, extended 1930's family home. This spacious home benefits from off-street parking to the front, fully fitted kitchen with window to rear, triple aspect open plan lounge/diner with bay to front garden and patio doors for access to the rear garden.
To the first floor you'll find two large double bedrooms, both with gernerous fitted wardrobes, and a family bathroom with separate toilet with a large landing with stairs leading to a further two rooms in the loft. The largest of these is currently used as a double bedroom with space for storage in the eaves and the other is used as an office.
The front garden is laid to lawn and the rear has large raised decking area with lawn, established flower beds, vegetable patch and a tool shed.
The property offers the best of both worlds, being on the cusp of Seven Kings Park, whilst at the same time having all that Seven Kings has to offer on its doorstep.
The property is within 0.5mi of choice of good rated primary schools and within a mile of two ofsted rated outstanding secondary schools.
Aldborough Road South is a sought after location which is perfect for commuters who travel into London via the Central Line only 0.5mi to Newbury Park and 1.0mi to Seven Kings mainline station. The property affords easy access to M25, M11, North Circular, A12 and A13.<br /><br />

Attractive 1 bedroom second-floor apartment in a gated development with private parking in sought-after Wanstead. Close to the extremely popular High Street and moments from Wanstead Central Line Station.

This second floor apartment comprises living / dining room with views over the George Green, modern kitchen with fitted matt grey and white gloss units & splash back, double bedroom leading to a part-tiled bathroom with bath tub & contemporary shower unit and a natural-stone colour palate.

A conveniently located residence with private gated parking in the heart of a vibrant East London Village that is bustling with cafes and restaurants and offers a wealth of public transport and road links.

Local underground stations are Wanstead and Snaresbrook (at either end of the High Street).

title: 5 bed semi-detached house for sale

address: Love Lane, Woodford Green, Essex IG8
detailedDescription:
***no onward chain***

Lawlors is pleased to offer this very attractive end of terrace house with off-street parking, three good-sized bedrooms, a lawned garden of approx. 68ft with a paved patio dining area and a self-contained 15'7 x 6'1 outbuilding offering scope for a home office/gym conversion.

The property is located within the District Council of Epping Forest bordering both Chigwell and Woodford Green and so offers easy access to Chigwell and Woodford Central Line Stations.

For families, a selection of highly regarded local schools, both state and independent, and a comprehensive range of amenities, restaurants and leisure facilities are all close by.

The well-presented and naturally light accommodation is arranged over two floors: On the ground floor a welcoming entrance hall leads to a bright and airy reception room with an additional spacious dining area, to the rear of the dining area double French Doors lead to the garden. Also accessed via the entrance hall is a galley kitchen, which too has entrance to the rear garden.

On the first floor there are two double bedrooms, a further single bedroom, which could also be used as a home office/study, and a family bathroom with an over-bath shower fitted with a glass shower screen.

To the front of the house there is off street parking.

Agents Note – the property would lend itself for extension, if required, and subject to planning permission.

An early internal viewing is advised to avoid disappointment.<br /><br />

address: Bedford Road, South Woodford, London E18
detailedDescription:
Offered Chain Free and with Vacant Possession !

Edward Taub are delighted to be able to offer to the market this ground floor purpose built apartment in a fabulous location. Situated a short walk to both South Woodford Central Line station and the shops of George Lane, this property offers two good sized bedrooms, a large, open plan lounge / diner with a fully fitted kitchen and a separate family bathroom suite. Other benefits include additional storage cupboards, double glazing throughout and being on the ground floor there is easy access to the communal gardens. The property also benefits from a security entryphone and (upon completion) its own garage.

The property offers easy access to A406, A12, M11 and M25 with the green expanses of Epping Forest on the doorstep. If schooling is of high importance then Snaresbrook Prep (Private) is moments away and both Oakdale Infants (ofsted : Good July 2018) & Oakdale Junior School (ofsted : Good July 2019) are both a short walk away and fall into catchment.

Please call the sales team today to arrange your viewing.

address: Tamara Court, Stradbroke Drive, Chigwell IG7
detailedDescription:
Preliminary announcement of the forthcoming launch - Occupation Summer 2021

A new and exclusive residence comprising of a collection of five luxurious apartments. Tamara Court is where timeless design meets the height of contemporary living on one of Chigwell’s most desirable roads – Stradbroke Drive.

In a place renowned for its high expectations and sense of style, the arrival of Tamara Court sets a striking new standard. Every detail of this remarkable new property has been carefully chosen to create the ultimate setting for luxurious living and entertaining. Each of the apartments at Tamara Court offers beautifully designed interiors, impressively grand proportions and opulent finishing touches.

The apartments each benefit from their own private terrace or gardens (ground floor only), with access to communal landscaped gardens, a residents’ gym, secure underground parking and private storage spaces.

The lower-ground floor of the residence is home to a fully-equipped, private gym for the ultimate in at-home luxury and convenience. A private underground car park offers the highest level of security, dedicated storage areas for each apartment and direct lift access to all floors.

Tamara Court is in a prime location in the heart of Chigwell. It is positioned moments from sprawling parks and the picturesque countryside. The highly regarded Chigwell Golf Club and Epping Forest are both local to this luxurious development. A variety of popular restaurants, cafés, hairdressing and nail salons and boutiques are also within easy reach.

This unique residence is well connected for fast and easy access to the City and Central London being conveniently situated on the Central Line. Whether it be for business or pleasure, the vibrant Capital can be reached within thirty minutes.
