title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
An absolutely adorable two bedroom Victorian mid terrace cottage in leafy Wanstead, close to both Epping Forest and Snaresbrook station. In excellent decorative order throughout, with perfectly balanced and generous living space inside and out, this is a gorgeous home ready for new people to love.

You're in a superb spot just six minutes from Wanstead High Street, surrounded by everything you need from handy amenities to glorious green spaces. You'll never want for fresh bread, a super Sunday roast, or a place to stretch your legs. It's just a couple of minutes from your door to either the picturesque Christ Church Gardens or Memorial Green, and only eight minutes to Leyton Flats.

If you lived here

You'll walk through your delectable, neat front garden and step straight into your lounge/diner, a splendid and serene space of 270 square foot, with carpeted stairs to the rear and bay window to the front. Grained engineered flooring leads your eye all the way to the back of the property. Past the stairs you'll come to your country style kitchen, with two-toned dove grey and white units, plus a ceramic butler sink.

To the rear you'll find your naturally lit bathroom, with dark grey tiling underfoot and bright white walls. There's a traditional white suite and shower over the tub. Back through the kitchen is the door to your charming secluded garden, with rounded paving giving way to tidy lawn. Upstairs sit your two bedrooms. The first is over 85 square feet and overlooks the garden. The second to the front is a generous 140 square foot, with twin triple glazed windows. It's a peaceful space, with soft neutral carpet underfoot.

Snaresbrook station is just eight minutes on foot for the Central Line so you can be at Liverpool Street in twenty minutes, less than half an hour door to door. Meanwhile it's a mile and a half to the North Circular, and drivers of electric vehicles will be pleased to find a charging station moments from the front door. If you're staying local you can stroll a mile across Leyton Flats to meet your feathered neighbours around Hollow Ponds, from parakeets to woodpeckers, and even take a row boat for a spin.

What else?

- Your new local is The Cuckfield, a former 19th century coaching inn with mouthwatering seasonal menus.
- You're three minutes from The Orange Tree, expert interior designers who'll help you make your new home just as you want it.
- If you're craving cake, you'll want to pay a visit to the Belgique cafe, where they can create anything from classic patisserie to gluten and egg free delights (not to mention 'surprise crocodile bread').

Garden (8.3m x 3.8m (27'2" x 12'5"))

Side Return (5.5m x 1.45m (18'0" x 4'9"))

Lounge/ Dining Room (3.70m x 6.73m (12'1" x 22'0" ))

Kitchen (2.24m x 3.02m (7'4" x 9'10" ))

Bedroom (3.72m x 3.50m (12'2" x 11'5" ))

Bedroom (2.88m x 2.73m (9'5" x 8'11" ))

A word from the owner..

"We have loved living in Wanstead, the community here is fantastic. There is a monthly street market along the high street just a 5 minute walk away and regular antique and craft fairs in the church hall in the park just behind the house. This park is also host to an annual music festival. There is a great selection of local shops, pubs and restaurants and an excellent choice of schools. It's only a 20-minute commute into London Liverpool Street and the house is situated a 5 minute walk away from both Snaresbrook and Wanstead tube stations. It’s also in close proximity to the forest and lake for great walks and jogs, so you've got the best of both worlds. We've put a lot of love into the house and garden and have made several improvements such as adding new triple glazed windows, updating the kitchen, redecorating both bedrooms and adding a new lush turf to the back garden and new shrubs to the front. As a pretty period property, Louise Cottages also has a great open plan living space downstairs, adding space and light to our cosy cottage. We will really miss living here and our lovely neighbours very much and we hope you will enjoy your time here as much as we have.”

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A pleasantly spacious and neatly appointed one bedroom apartment. You're on the ground floor of a modest, distributed development sat amongst communal grounds on a peaceful no through road just a short walk from bustling Wanstead High Street, the leafy green heart of this popular East London village.

Eagle Pond's tranquil blue waters are your gateway to the wild wide open greenery of Epping Forest, all just a half mile on foot anytime you want to lose yourself in nature.

If you lived here

You'll be enjoying tranquil summer evenings in your substantial communal gardens, with plenty of space for solitude or getting to know your neighbours as you prefer. Inside, your dedicated reception room is a welcoming 160 square feet, and plushly appointed with soft grey carpets and walls.

To the rear your bedroom's a similarly stylish double, with plenty of floor to ceiling fitted storage. Elsewhere and your kitchen has a pleasing, rustic feel with blonde hardwood style flooring and mottled tiling splashback. Your bathroom's just as smart, with more blonde hardwood and pristine tiling from floor to ceiling, while finally there's a wealth of fitted storage in the hallway.

Outside it's just ten minutes on foot to Wanstead High Street. Flanked by open green spaces, here you'll find a fine a choice of independent bars, restaurants and gastropubs (the Sunday Roast at the recently refurbished The Bull is especially unmissable) as well as all manner of artisanal produce suppliers including a dedicated butchers and fishmonger. There's even a traditional East End Pie & Mash shop.

What else?

- Snaresbrook zone 4 tube station is just ten minutes walk and will get you directly to the City and the West End via the Central line.
- If you fancy a change from Wanstead High Street, South Woodford's social hub of George Lane is less than fifteen minutes on foot, for a further choice of bars and restaurants as well as the Odeon Cinema.
- You have private off street parking and drivers can be on the North Circular in less than ten minutes.

Explore our 'Wonders of Wanstead' pages for everything this picturesque part of East London has to offer.

Just 18 minutes direct from Liverpool Street, the long high street nevertheless has a real village feel with a great range of fine pubs and restaurants.

Off the beaten track, Wanstead is a place of peaceful avenues, open green spaces and generously proportioned properties.

With prices still amongst the capital's more affordable, Wanstead is proving a popular destination for those looking to upscale and first time buyers alike.

detailedDescription:
Located in the popular New Wanstead area, situated within close proximity to Snaresbrook Central Line Station (0.4 miles) and Wanstead High Street (0.3 miles), with its array of shops, restaurants and bars.

Built in 2008, this two bedroom apartment is situated on the ground floor of this contemporary development. Externally, the gated entry and entry phone system gives an added sense of security, whilst the communal entrance halls are clearly well maintained.

Being purpose built, internally the accommodation is very well set out with living and dining space occupying one side of the apartment and the bedrooms and bathrooms on the other side. Accessed via an internal hallway with a good deal of storage space, the main lounge/diner is spacious and light. The dark wooden floor, which is also present in the hallway, bright white walls, recessed spot lights and contemporary kitchen gives the room a real 'wow factor'.

The property further benefits from underfloor heating throughout, allocated parking for one car and no onward chain.

title: 3 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Guide price - £500,000 - £525,000. 3 bedroom family home, 2 bathrooms, driveway, W/C, study room and conservatory.

Located on a quiet cul-de-sac this impressive property has loads of potential. As you enter the first room you will come accross is your kitchen, tucked away on the left hand side.

Continue through the hallway, past your W/C, you are greeted with your sizeable living room. Tons of space to plan around with in this room with the added bonus of a conservatory at the back of the room. Separated with bi-folding doors you can have this space fully open or closed away as you please.

Just off the living room is another reception room, currently being used as the study/home office. Alow maintenace garden completes the downstairs.

Upstairs you will find 2 double bedrooms and a smaller 3rd double. The first room 'the master' comes with a modern en-suite and inbuilt storage. Opposite this bedroom is also your family bathroom.

To the left hand side of the property you come past the smaller of the 3 rooms before entering your final double bedroom located at the end of the hallway.

Retreat Way is a perfect location for families looking for a slightly more rural lifestyle, the entrance to the forest at the end of the road gives you acres of walking space to enjoy and plenty of open greenery for the kids. Whilst having a rural vibe, traveling to London could not be easier. You closest station sits just a 4 minute driveaway with central line access into the capital.

Please quote lbsh on all telephone enquiries.

detailedDescription:
Chain free - Lovely three bedroom house for sale

This property is a great investment opportunity with fantastic letting potential or can make a lovely family home. Skampi have fully renovated this property from top to bottom which includes fresh paint work, complete hardwood flooring and a newly fitted bathroom suite. This property has double glazing throughout the house with complete gas central heating.

Good size lounge with access to the rear private garden via the sliding patio door.

A fully fitted kitchen with integrated appliances (excluding the dishwasher) with views that overlook the front of the property. This space has been extended by converting the garage to create a spacious dining area .

One large double bedroom with a built in cupboard space and a newly fitted wardrobe with mirrored sliding doors.
This room looks over the rear garden of the property.

Second bedroom holds a double bed and has access to it's own shower room.
Third bedroom also can hold a double bed.
Both bedrooms overlook the front of the property.

A newly fitted bathroom with stylish fixtures and fittings compromising of chic finishes and chrome fittings. The w.c is separate and has again been fitted with a stylish and modern finish.

The hallway boasts a hard wood flooring both upstairs and downstairs, with the stair case still in its original wood which has been recently painted.

Skampi have managed this property for over 10 years and have full property history. It has been well maintained over the years and is currently tenanted with working professionals.

address: Cunningham Close, Chadwell Heath, Romford RM6
detailedDescription:
Summary

The flat is excellently located next to nearby amenities including local independent shops, cafes, and restaurants. For those trying to keep active there's plenty to do with St Chad's Park also situated close by to the flat. The local area provides great transport links with local bus links direct outside the flat and two train stations within short distance. The two stations are Chadwell Heath station and Goodmayes station. A retirement home specifically for 60 year olds and over. The successful buyer will be required to attend an interview and also participate in a medical assessment.

There's also excellent road links with nearby access to the A12, A406 and A13. The flat itself features: Natural light throughout, double-glazed windows throughout, soft carpeted floors throughout, a spacious lounge, a modern kitchen and shower room. The flat consists of a good size bedroom with built in floor to ceiling wardrobes.

The lounge area is a good size, allows for a dining area and offers direct access to the semi open plan kitchen area. The kitchen is contemporary and has ample worktop space for food preparation and includes integrated appliances including the hob/oven and also includes a washing machine, microwave and fridge. The kitchen space also has tiled flooring and part tiled walls.

The modern shower room consists of a corner shower, a hand washbasin and a w.c. The flat further includes a communal reception, kitchen and garden for the residents to gather and socialize.

title: 3 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
Once inside this lovely maisonette the standard of accommodation can be fully appreciated. All rooms are set off the landing, giving the property a spacious feel.

The spacious sitting/dining room has a large half bay window ensuring the space is flooded by natural light whilst the recess brick fireplace with wooden mantle gives the room a cosy feel. The kitchen is fitted with a range of modern cabinets complemented by contrasting work surfaces. Integrated appliances include oven, hob, extractor fan and dishwasher. There are two spacious bedrooms, both enjoying garden views, the principle with fitted wardrobes ensuring plenty of storage space.
A modern bathroom, fitted with a white suite, completes the accommodation.

To the rear of the property is a beautiful garden which commences with a decked terrace giving plenty of space for a table and chairs. The garden is laid to lawn with planted borders. A superb outbuilding lends itself well to use as a home office.

South Woodford Central Line Station and George Lane with its eclectic mix of shops, bars and restaurants is just 0.9 miles away.

We understand from the seller that fibre internet has recently been fitted at the property.

A note from the seller:
It is with a heavy heart that we have to leave our lovely family home. It has been a great place to live with our little family and we are proud of how it has grown with us. We hope that whoever buys this maisonette loves it as much as we do and also thrives in the community this street has built up especially through lockdown with the street WhatsApp group. The garden office was lovingly built by a very good company onsite and was bespoke and I really hope whoever lives here enjoys the office as much as we did. The area we are situated in sits in a great place within easy reach of parks and forests and if you are a keen cyclist then Epping is a short 10 minute cycle from here. There are some great playgrounds for children in the area too and the neighbours are fantastic and friendly.

detailedDescription:
Arbon & Miller are privileged to offer this delightfully extended three bedroom mid-terrace family home situated in this popular cul-de-sac turning immediately off New North Road. The property is conveniently positioned within close proximity to local shopping facilities and bus services, as well as being within a few minutes walk to Hainault Central Line Underground Station which offers direct access to Stratford within approx. 20 minutes and Liverpool Street within approx. 30 minutes. Penrith Road is also within close proximity to the ever popular Penrith Park & Recreation Grounds, along with Fairlop Waters Country Park which boasts a delightful setting of ancient woodlands and picturesque fishing lakes. The property boasts spacious living accommodation throughout with the ground floor comprising of a 17ft Lounge, 11ft2 Dining Room and 14ft9 Extended Kitchen, with additional Shower Room. The first floor is complimented with three well-proportioned Bedrooms and Family Bathroom. Externally, Penrith Road includes a well maintained private Rear Garden and Front Garden providing private Driveway. Penrith Road also offers further potential for development to accommodate a loft conversion (stpp.). We highly recommend an internal inspection to appreciate the properties many key features.

Entrance Porch

Property Description

Offered to the market situated on the ever popular commonwealth estate is this Extended Five bedroom mid terraced family home.

The property boasts spacious two receptions, modern fitted kitchen and a utility room, to the first floor there are three good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom. The Loft has been extended and consists of a shower room and two additional bedrooms.

Externally to the front there is parking for two cars and to the rear a private rear garden.

General Information

Auctioneer's Comments

This property is offered for sale by Online Auction which is a flexible and buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will not be exchanging contracts on the fall of the virtual hammer, but will be given 56 working days in which to complete the transaction, from the date the Draft Contract is issued by the vendor’s solicitor.

By giving a buyer time to exchange contracts on the property, normal residential finance can be arranged. The Buyer’s Premium secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. Fees paid to the Auctioneer may be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property and be included in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Further clarification on this must be sought from your legal representative.

The buyer will be required to give the Auctioneers authority to sign the Reservation Form on their behalf and to confirm acceptance of the Terms and Conditions prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation Form and all Terms and Conditions can be found in the Information Pack which can be downloaded from our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Upon close of a successful auction, or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to make payment of a non-refundable Buyer’s Premium of £7,800 including VAT, plus an administration charge of £354 including VAT, a total of £8,154. This secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. Any additional fees and charges over and above this will be confirmed within the terms and conditions available on the auction website.

The Buyer’s Premium and administration charge are in addition to the final negotiated selling price.

detailedDescription:
*Guide Price £475,000 - £500,000* Located in the exclusive and sought after development of Regency Court, is this two bedroom, first floor apartment with stunning views over the communal grounds. The gated development benefits from a private setting offering an allocated parking space, communal grounds, security entrance, 24⁄7 concierge, communal cinema room and a private balcony. Nestled on the first floor this impressive apartment spans over 750sq.ft offering spacious accommodation throughout. The modern apartment comprises of two double bedrooms with built in storage, an en-suite to the master bedroom, separate family bathroom and modern kitchen and bathroom.
South Woodford is a suburb of Woodford in North East London and formed part of Essex until 1965. George Lane is the retail High Street for South Woodford and there is plenty to do during the day and in the evenings. As you walk towards the central line station you will pass a variety of trendy bars, cafes, restaurants and supermarkets including Waitrose and Marks and Spencers, giving the area a real vibrant vibe. South Woodford central line station is moments away providing direct access into the City and West End.

detailedDescription:
**guide price - £570,000 - £580,000**

Ideally located within walking distance of South Woodford Tube Station, this large two-bedroom home is not to be missed. Well maintained throughout, the property really does offer excellent, well-proportioned, and stylish living space.

On entry an enclosed porch with deep storage cupboards leads to a welcoming hallway and contemporary downstairs W.C. The impressive, spacious lounge/dining room opens into a separate kitchen.

On the first floor, you’ll find two large well-lit double bedrooms (scope to create three bedrooms) and a modern family bathroom.

Externally, the generous front garden is laid to lawn. The west-facing rear garden boasts a lawn, flower beds, patio area ideal for entertaining, plus a handy brick built shed.

Additional benefits include an allocated parking space and ample storage throughout.
Location


Torrington Road is enviably located within a short walk to local amenities on George Lane and South Woodford tube station. It also offers easy road access to the M25, M11 and North Circular, is just minutes from Snaresbrook Primary School and within the catchment area for Wanstead High School. For those who love nature, Epping forest and Wanstead Park are also within easy reach.

A word from the owner..

“The house offers so much space and light – the road is quiet and friendly and the location is perfect for the tube, the shops and Wanstead or South Woodford cafes, pubs and parks. We’ve loved living here and know the next owner will too.”

Viewings can be booked 24 hours a day and an internal viewing is highly recommended

Superbly positioned in Chigwell Row and close to Grange hill central line station is this exceptionally spacious two-bedroom apartment, set in a quiet and popular cul-de-sac. The property consists of a large bedroom, bathroom, kitchen/diner and comes with an allocated parking space in addition to a lease of over 100 years remaining.
The spacious hallway has an intercom system that is connected to the communal doors at the entrance of the building which provides additional security. Also within the hallway are two large storage cupboards. The modern fitted kitchen is fully tiled and currently has an electric cooker but also offers more room to add any additional appliances. The bedrooms are very well proportioned with adequate space for additional bedroom furniture. The bathroom is of an excellent proportion, partially tiled with an elegant finish. detailedDescription:
Guide Price £900,000 - £950,000

Situated in this desirable location within the popular Oaklands Hamlet development, lies this spacious detached residence arranged over three floors, bordering onto a woodland area with golf course beyond. The property offers well-presented family accommodation and features an extremely spacious principal bedroom with en-suite shower room. There are four further double bedrooms with a ‘Jack and Jill’ shower room serving the two bedrooms to the top floor, whilst a family bathroom and study are to the first floor. The sitting room enjoys a dual aspect and the family can all get together for cooking, dining and relaxing within the combined kitchen/diner and living space. There is also a cloakroom to the ground floor. Outside there is the benefit of a double garage and drive with parking for two vehicles, whilst the rear garden is of a good size.

Oaklands Hamlet borders onto Hainault Golf Course with the club house being within 1.6 miles, ideal for buyers whose leisure time is enjoying a game of golf. Further open spaces can be found at Hainault Forest Country Park and Fairlop Waters Country Park being within 1.4 and 2.7 miles respectively. For getting into London there are a choice of Central Line tube stations located at Fairlop being 2.8 miles, Hainault 2.7 miles and Barkingside 3.7 miles. We understand from the vendors there is a bus shuttle service direct to Hainault Station. Barkingside High Street - with a wide selection of shops - is only 3.4 miles away and there is a popular farm shop located just off Forest Road within about 2.5 miles.<br /><br />
<b>Important note to purchasers:</b><br/> We endeavour to make our sales particulars accurate and reliable, however, they do not constitute or form part of an offer or any contract and none is to be relied upon as statements of representation or fact. title: 3 bed property for sale

detailedDescription:
Sold chain free is this attractive 1930's 4 bedroom extended semi detached family home which is perfectly located for Woodford Central Line station, local shops, schools and restaurants. Offers a bright and spacious accommodation with off street parking and good size rear garden.

Guide Price £750,000 - £800,000

Situated in the heart of Woodford Green and popular Grosvenor Gardens is this extended 1930's 4 bedroom family home which ticks all the boxes for contemporary living. This attractive property is sold chain free and is an ideal family home.

This spacious home benefits from off-street parking to the front, lounge, further reception room, 2nd large through lounge, ground floor w.c and fully fitted kitchen.
The appeal continues on the first floor where you'll find four bedrooms and a family bathroom.
This house offers a really excellent footprint with a great layout well.

The garden is a great size with lawn leading to a patio where you can enjoy BBQs and the summer sun.

The property offers the best of both worlds, being on the cusp of amazing open green spaces, whilst at the same time having all that Woodford has to offer on its doorstep.

Grosvenor Gardens is a sought after location which is perfect for commuters who travel into London via the Central Line. Woodford station is only a few minutes' walk and goes directly into Liverpool Street (20mins), Stratford and the West End (27 mins).
Also close by are the array of restaurants, independent shops and supermarkets on The Broadway and other local amenities.
If its good schools you are looking for you, there are a number of private and state schools close by.

detailedDescription:
Caplen Estates welcomes to the market this character three bedroom terraced house which has retained its grade ll listed canopy and is situated in Woodford Green, Essex. This property is set within easy access to local amenities, Woodford Central Line Station, A406 & M11 Motorway.

When entering the property you are meet by a spacious entrance hall giving access to the main reception room which offers sash bay windows with paquet flooring which sweeps through to the connected kitchen/breakfast room. The bespoke kitchen is complete with shaker style kitchen units, quartz worktops, range cooker/oven, integrated dishwasher, microwave, butler sink and space for an American style fridge/freezer.

The first floor landing leads to the master bedroom with fitted wardrobes, further double bedroom and one single bedroom. The bathroom is partly tiled complete with three piece suite and shower attachment. The private rear courtyard garden is low maintenance with part paved/slate flooring with mature beds & shrubs. detailedDescription: *Offers In Excess Of £450,000* A charming two bedroom modern apartment situated in a prime location on Woodford High Road. The property is nestled on the first floor within a converted chapel benefiting views over the green itself and is offered to the market chain free. This newly renovated property offers a large lounge with separate modern kitchen, two bedrooms, an en-suite bathroom to the master and an additional modern bathroom. Throughout the property there are exposed brick walls, underfloor heating and lots of natural light making the apartment feel warm and homely. The bedrooms are positioned to the rear of the building giving the added benefit of peace and quiet where desired. The property shares it entrance facing into Links Road and benefits from built in storage, a built in audio system and a long lease of over 900 years. With excellent local schools, wonderful green public spaces and fantastic local amenities this two bedroom apartment makes for an ideal first home or buy to let investment. A viewing comes highly advised to appreciate the accommodation on offer here and not miss out on a potential first home.

detailedDescription:
Five Well Proportioned Bedrooms - Prestigious Repton Park Development - Finished To An Exceptionally High Standard Throughout - Spacious Reception/ Dining Room - Modern Kitchen/Breakfast Room - Downstairs W.C - Utility Room - Well Presented Rear Garden With Patio - Acres Of Communal Gardens - Multiple En-Suites - 24hr Security Within The Development- Virgin Active Gym Located In The Private Development

Durden & Hunt welcome to the market this stunning five bedroom family home located in the prestigious Repton Park development. Repton Park is a well sought after development set in acres of picturesque communal gardens and landscaped grounds .Other benefits of this luxury community include CCTV, 24-hour concierge, and an exclusive Virgin Active Spa and Gym.

The ground floor of this attractive property benefits from a spacious reception/dining room, a modern kitchen/breakfast room with integrated appliances, an office and a utility room.

Continuing through this beautifully presented property, the first floor compromises of three well proportioned bedrooms one of which has a balcony, and two modern fitted bathrooms, both of which are en-suite. One of the bedrooms is being used as a TV room with a built in speaker system. The second floor of the property boasts two double bedrooms, a large bathroom and an exceptional amount of storage space and a gymnasium.

Externally this marvellous property benefits from a well presented rear garden with a patio, as well as this there is a driveway to the front. Additionally, the property boasts solar panels producing 4.34kW of power and an electric vehicle charging point.

The property is in an excellent location, being situated in the Repton Park Development, whilst also being within reach of Chigwell Underground Station, which is on the Central Line, and provides direct access to Central London. Furthermore, this superb property is within walking distance to local shops and amenities.

Buy it now option available

This property is for sale by Online Auction. The Online Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will have 56 working days to exchange and complete once the draft contract has been issued by the vendors solicitor. Allowing the additional time to exchange and complete on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer with be required to put down a non-refundable reservation fee. The fee will be a fixed fee including the Vat, this secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to agree to our terms and conditions prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found on the online Auction website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is typically no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by goto Auctions.

To book a viewing visit goto Online Auctions.
Buyer's Administration Charge
If the Buyer Information Pack has been produced and provided by goto Group any successful purchaser will be required to pay £354.00 (including VAT) towards the cost of the preparation of the pack. These can then be used by your solicitor to progress the sale.
There are no other fees or charges payable to the Auctioneer however, there are other costs to consider such as:
• Stamp Duty Land Tax (sdlt) is applicable if you buy a property or land over a certain price in England, Wales, ni.

General Information

Auctioneer's Comments

This property is for sale by Online Auction which is a flexible and buyer friendly method of purchase. The purchaser will not be exchanging contracts on the fall of the virtual hammer but will be given 56 working days in which to complete the transaction, from the date the Draft Contract is issued by the seller’s solicitor. By giving a buyer time to exchange contracts on the property, means normal residential finance can be sort.

The Buyer’s Premium secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. Fees paid to the Auctioneer may be considered as part of the chargeable consideration for the property and be included in the calculation for stamp duty liability. Further clarification on this must be sought from your legal representative. The buyer will be required to sign a Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Info Pack which can be downloaded for free from our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to make payment of a non-refundable Buyers Premium of £5,400 including VAT plus an administration charge of £354 including VAT, a total of £5,754. This secures the transaction and takes the property off the market.

The Buyer’s Premium and administration charge are in addition to the final negotiated selling price.

• You will need a Solicitor to act for you during the conveyancing and your Solicitor will advise you in relation to the associated costs. If you do not have a Solicitor, we can recommend the services of one of our Panel Solicitors who are all selected for their expertise in Auction Transactions. Durden & Hunt welcome to the market this well presented two bedroom ground floor maisonette located in Clayhall. detailedDescription:
Guide Price Offers in Excess of £675,000.

Property Features

· EPC Rating: C

. Spacious, Modern, and Tastefully Decorated home over 2000 Square feet living space.

About This Property

Cranbrook Lettings is pleased to offer for sale a four-bedroom terraced house. This property sits in a prime location close to Gants Hill Underground station, Schools, local shops, and Supermarkets making this the ideal Family home.

The terraced house has recently been extended and refurbished to a very high standard. The vendors have spent time and effort to really make their renovations exceptional. Their additions include underfloor heating to the full ground floor area, upgraded modern Plumbing (including two combi boilers) and electrics, German fitted Kitchen with Quartz worktops, fully fitted bedroom wardrobes, loft extension with Bi-folding doors opening on to a glass balustrade balcony and front drive for two cars. The rear of the house has a family sized garden with raised deking and covered aluminium canopy for year-round outdoor use. The outbuilding leads on from the garden and has space for two cars which can be accessed by a secure electric remote controlled rolling shatter and gated alleyway to the rear.

This fantastic opportunity to purchase a modern house comprises of: -

entrance
Via enclosed porch, door to entrance hall with stairs to first floor, Underfloor heated porcelain tile flooring, ceiling light, doors utility and kitchen and the through lounge.

Double glazed bay Windows with ceiling spotlights to the front, with underfloor heated porcelain wood effect tile flooring, two 5 light polished chrome & Crystal Chandelier ceiling lights, and double-glazed sliding door to extended dining and kitchen.

Kitchen & Dinner (2.56m max x 2.25m)

German made wall and base units, quartz work surface with glass splash back, built-in five ring gas hob, oven, and extractor, large one bowl sink with drainer, underfloor heated porcelain tile flooring, pitched roof with two Velux windows. Ceiling spotlights and French double door to rear garden.

Guest WC & shower (2.7m x1m)

Shower enclosure, low level WC, pedestal hand wash basin, mirrored vanity cupboard, tiled flooring, and light.

First floor landing

Carpeted with spotlights. Access to loft room via fixed spiral staircase, carpeted with Velux Skylight windows and ceiling spotlights.

Bedroom one (3.19m ex bay x 3.63m)
Double glazed bay window to front, carpet, fitted wardrobes, double radiator, down and spotlights.

Bedroom two (4.30m x 3.37m)
Double glazed window to rear, carpet, fitted wardrobes, double radiator, down and spotlights.

Bedroom three (2.69m x 2.30m)
Double glazed window to front, carpet, fitted wardrobes and light.

Bathroom (2.64m x 1.63m)
Suite comprising; Bathtub, Shower enclosure, Large wash basin with fitted cupboard, polished chrome heated towel rail radiator, LED illuminated mirror with shaving socket, airing cupboard, fully tiled walls and floor, double glazed window, and rear spotlights.

First floor WC (1.2m x 0.8m)

Separate Low-level WC, tiled walls and flooring, light, radiator, double glazed window to rear.

Loft bedroom (5.8m x 4.4m)

Spacious bedroom with fitted wardrobes, Bi-folding door leading to secure covered glass balustrade balcony with down lights, two large Velux windows, eves storage area installed with a separate boiler in the eve’s cupboard, three high efficiency anthracite radiators and down light and spotlights.

Loft ensuiite (2.5m x 1.4m)

Shower enclosure, low level WC, Wall mounted wash basin, anthracite heated towel rail radiator, LED illuminated mirror with shaving socket, tiled walls and flooring, spotlights.

Rear exterior
The rear garden measures approximately 30'. Fitted with full width aluminium canopy with decking area, Grass lawn and flowerbed. Access to Outbuilding

outbuilding (5.8m x 5.3m)

There is a spacious double-glazed outbuilding which can be used as games room, storage or as a double garage with electric remote controlled roller shutter. Alternat access to outbuilding via external gated alleyway

driveway

CCTV in the front / back with Fully secured with alarms

address: Denehurst Gardens, Woodford Green, Essex IG8
detailedDescription:
An outstanding newly built house finished to the highest specification. Ideally situated for the amenities in Woodford Green and approx. And 0.6 miles to the tube station.

Location

Woodford tube station 1 mile, Roding Valley tube station 0.6 miles, M25 (Junction 26) 6.1 miles, Bancroft's School 0.4 miles, Chigwell School 3.1 miles. All distances are approximate

Denehurst Gardens is a good turning on the sought after Knighton Estate and is ideally situated for local amenities. There is a parade of shops next to the tube station in Woodford with a variety of independent shops, restaurants and bars. There are excellent transport links into London and several well regarded state and private schools within easy reach.

Description

The house comprises of well laid out accommodation over three light and spacious floors. The internal fixtures and fittings have been carefully chosen to provide the house with a modern and contemporary feel throughout. On the ground floor you will find the entrance hallway and WC, living room with bay window, fabulous open plan kitchen diner and study. The kitchen offers a generous and bright space and is epicentre for modern living creating a sociable space and a pleasurable cooking environment. The kitchen is equipped with quartz work tops, conventional and steam oven, coffee machine, integrated wine cooler, microwave, dishwasher and fridge freezer. Large Bi-fold doors invite the outside in. The entire ground floor has underfloor heating.

To the 1st floor are 3 double bedrooms and the family bathroom. The master bedroom is an impressive space complete with a luxurious en suite bathroom with separate shower. There is also large terrace with a feature glass floor offering a window into the kitchen diner. Bedroom 2 has the benefit of a en suite shower room.

To the 2nd floor you will find the 4th bedroom suite that is complimented by an en suite shower room and walk in wardrobe.

Exterior

To the front is a blocked paved driveway with space for several cars and side access to both ends of the house. The good sized rear garden comprises a raised decked patio area and large lawn. One of the keys selling features of this house is the good sized heated swimming pool perfect for those hot sunny days. The pool is complimented by an outdoor shower room and pump house.

detailedDescription:
Rare To The Local Market. "Georgian Splendour" This quite beautiful example of a Late Georgian Three Storey Town House complete with Wrought Iron Balcony Facade and Canopy as well as a wealth of period features throughout. The particularly spacious and flexible accommodation comprises of 4/5 Bedrooms and or 2/3 Receptions plus a great size Kitchen/Breakfast room. Viewing this property really does feel like experiencing a piece of History with its high ceilings, ceiling roses, sash windows and even window shutters to the front Lounge. The first floor Drawing room has a real feeling of elegance, approached via double doors and with an imposing Fire place and complete with Balcony views. Externally the property boasts a good size and West facing rear garden with lawn and patio areas as well as the convenient addition of an Outbuilding. The property also comes with the added benefit of a Garage which is located conveniently en bloc within only approximately 50 meter's of the property

detailedDescription:
Five bedroom detached family home in the much sought after Oakwood Gate Estate.

Upon entering the house you are greeted by bright and airy hallway, on the left is a spacious kitchen/diner, with separate utility room which allows access to the garden. There are two generous receptions, one being a sitting room that overlooks the south facing garden and benefits from patio doors. The other reception is currently being used as a bedroom but could quite easily be a formal dining room or home office if required. There is also a downstairs WC. On the first floor there are four bedrooms, the master bedroom benefiting from private en-suite shower room. There is also a family bathroom with WC, wash hand basin and a bath with overhead shower.

There is potential to extend the property subject to planning consent, with space a 10-metre space to the side of the house, as well as the large loft space that’s could easily accommodate two further bedrooms if more space is required or you would like to add value.

detailedDescription:
This family home enjoys the benefit of being within the catchment area of Nightingale Primary School, which has been rated 'Outstanding' by Ofsted. You are also within a short and equal distance (0.8 miles) of both Wanstead and Snaresbrook Central Line stations as well as being within walking distance or a very short bus ride to Wanstead High Street, with is array of restaurants, shops and bars.

On approach, the driveway and smart frontage all help to create a welcoming first impression. Stepping inside, there is a handy hallway to store all of your coats and shoes and a downstairs toilet, which is ideal for guests. You then lead through to the spacious, dual aspect sitting/dining room which provides plenty of space for dining and relaxing and has patio doors leading into the garden. The kitchen is fitted with a range of light wood cabinets with contrasting work surfaces and some integrated appliances.

Upstairs you will discover three bedrooms and a family bathroom with white suite. There is also an ensuite shower room to the master bedroom, which helps makes the family rush to get ready in the morning a little less stressful! There is also further potential to extend into the loft to create a further bedroom (stpc).

There is a secluded garden to the rear which benefits from side access and provides the perfect area for the children to play in, or for hosting BBQ's in the summer.

Please note that this property is for sale by the Modern Method of Auction which is not to be confused with Traditional auction. The Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer-friendly method of purchase. We do not require the buyer to exchange contracts immediately, but grant 28 days to achieve exchange of contracts from the date the buyer's solicitor is in receipt of the draft contracts and a further 28 days thereafter to complete. Allowing the additional time to exchange on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to put down a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 3.6% (inclusive of VAT) subject to a minimum of £6,000 (inclusive of VAT) which secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to sign an Acknowledgment of Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Legal Pack which can be downloaded for free from the auction section of our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is generally no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by Douglas Allen powered by iam-sold Ltd.

detailedDescription: Located on the edge of Epping Forest stands this impressive four bedroom family home with views over the surrounding woodland. Walking in from the quiet, secluded close you’re welcomed into the spacious entrance hall leading to a large through lounge offering plenty of natural light and a feature fireplace. A modern kitchen with space for dining is nestled just off the dining area with a breakfast bar and views out onto the woodland. Door from the dining room lead out onto a raised patio area, ideal for entertaining, with steps leading down to the lawn and annexe which offers a large room ideal for study, office, gym or bedroom with its own kitchen and bathroom. The first floor offers a spacious master bedroom, two further guest rooms and a large modern bathroom with a shower and his & hers sinks. The top floor is home to an impressive room with build in storage space and wonderful views out over the Woodland. This attractive property is ideal for families as it is set in a private cul-de-sac off Woodford New Road and offers not only close proximity to many popular schools but also Woodford, South Woodford and Highams Park’s amenities.

detailedDescription:
**Book viewings instantly by visiting our website or download our award-winning App **

This is a fantastic opportunity to own a spacious two bedroom purpose built flat in Nadir Court, Blake Hall Road, Wanstead E11.

The property has a spacious and practical layout and you will enjoy 664 sq ft of living space with plenty of practical storage space.

Located on the second floor of this sought after development, It features two double bedrooms with both bedrooms benefiting from fitted cupboards, a three piece bathroom suite, fitted kitchen and a spacious reception room which receives an abundance of natural light

Further benefits include an external storage shed, secure underground allocated parking and a well maintained communal garden.

Location
The property is well located and close to an array of local amenities including a range of shops, cafes, restaurants and popular bars and pubs such as The Duke and The Nightingale - beautiful gastropubs just a short distance away. The local park and a nearby golf course are only a 10 minute walk away.
Transport links are easily accessible with both Wanstead Station & Snaresbrook Station - Wanstead being just 0.4 miles away and Snaresbrook a mere 0.8 miles. They will take you directly to Liverpool Street in under 20 minutes. The A12, A406 North Circular and the M11 are also just a short distance away. It also has many sought after nursery, primary and secondary schools all under a mile away which are rated Good-Outstanding in their most recent Ofsted reports.

Leasehold Information
The lease has approx 963 years remaining with an annual service charge of £1,500 per annum. Ground rent is not applicable as the owners share the freehold.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription: Grand 5 bedroom, 3 reception semi-detached family house with large carriage driveway for several cars and detached garage just a few minutes walk from Wanstead underground station. The ground floor comprises a spacious L-shaped living & dining room and large drawing-room for entertaining; the welcoming entrance hall gives access to an open-plan kitchen diner, downstairs shower room and cellar. The fully-fitted kitchen has granite surfaces and built-in appliances and gives access to a low-maintenance paved garden; the garden continues around to the side of the property where a barbecue area leads conveniently to the rear of the detached garage which can be converted for use as a home gym, games room or home office. First floor comprises the family bathroom with hi-tech steam shower and Jacuzzi bath with ambient lighting, 5 double bedrooms, one with en suite and similar steam shower setup. The second floor has been part-converted and is currently being used for storage but is a very versatile space for a further bedroom or office. This is an elegantly finished and highly attractive home and a wonderful place to entertain guests. The location offers fast access to The City and West End via Wanstead Station (Central Line), great dining options in the highly-regarded Wanstead High Street and high achieving public and private schools Freehold with no onward chain, this property is available exclusively with Bairstow Eves Wanstead.
title: 5 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Positioned just a short walk from Snaresbrook, Wanstead and Leytonstone Stations, Petty Son and Prestwich are proud to offer for sale this luxurious, two bedroom, purpose built apartment, which benefits from a generous kitchen/breakfast room and sitting room with a balcony.

This two bedroom apartment is perfectly located for commuters, being within close proximity of the A12 and within a short walk of Wanstead (0.6 miles) Snaresbrook (0.6 miles) and Leytonstone (0.7 miles) stations. Epping Forest is within a few feet of the property and as well as providing beautiful views from the bedroom windows, it is the perfect place to go for a run, bike ride or walk on a sunny day.

The property is situated on the top floor in a very well maintained block and has secure underground parking. Internally, the layout works well, with both bedrooms and bathroom located to the rear which overlooks the gardens, leaving the living, entertaining and dining space towards the front. The décor throughout is bright and contemporary with dark wooden floors and white walls in the hallway, and light grey in the main bedroom and living area.

The master bedroom is a fantastic size and has a generous amount of fitted wardrobe space, whilst the single bedroom can accommodate a study area as well as a single bed. The slick contemporary bathroom can easily accommodate a large shower as well as a great deal of storage, while the impressive kitchen is any cook enthusiasts' dream, with a large amount of preparation space and a handy breakfast bar.

detailedDescription:
Rare to the market and located on this unique plot in the Monkhams Estate is this 4 bedroom detached chalet bungalow which is full of potential. The property is very secluded with a large frontage and located with stunning views over the green and beyond. Sold chain free.

Located on the ever popular Monkhams Estate is Inmans Row which is widely known as one of Woodford Green's premier residential family roads. This eye catching detached chalet bungalow has many impressive features which includes a secluded tranquil wide plot. The property has an abundance of potential, this along with the position opposite the green and Church makes this property hugely attractive and rare to the market.

This four bedroom detached property offers excellent size accommodation which can be tailored to sort suit many different buyers requirements. The property is in need of modernisation and can be extended even further subject to the correct planning permission. The ground floor has a large reception hall, fitted kitchen, dining room, 23ft lounge, 2 bedrooms or reception rooms, bathroom and W.C Located on the first floor there are 2 bedrooms and en suite bathroom.

This impressive house has a carriage driveway plus a large front garden and detached garage with storage and utility room. To the rear of the house there is a stunning rear garden which also has lovely views from the features off the Church.

Inmans Row is an exclusive road and provides the perfect balance of local amenities and leafy green areas. There are also local shops, cafes and restaurants with Woodford Broadway and High Road being close by. You are also within a short stroll of Roding Valley, Buckhurst Hill and Woodford Central Line station which is perfect for your daily commute into London. There are a number of state and private schools close by which makes this an ideal family home with an opportunity to make their own mark onto this wonderful house. Transport links are excellent with M25 & M11 junctions also being within easy reach.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Located on Jefferson Close in Gants Hill, a quiet cul-de-sac located between Gants Hill (0.7 miles) and Barkingside (1 mile) Underground Stations and Newbury Park Overground Station (0.8 Miles), this home is also well located for a range of primary and nursery schools – perfect for families wanting to limit the time it takes to do the school run!

Externally there is a wide driveway with side access to the property's rear garden which is mainly laid to lawn with a pathway running down one side. Internally the ground floor offers two large reception rooms, the first spanning just under 19 foot in length and the second just under 20 foot and leading into the home's spacious kitchen/diner. The kitchen/diner has plenty of space for a range of wall units as well as a large dining table, but with a separate utility room there is no need to incorporate any of the larger, nosier white goods such as a washing machine or dishwasher into the main dining/cooking space. There is access to the wide rear garden from the kitchen/diner and separate storeroom that you can access via the kitchen area. There is an option to reconfigure the ground floor by way of a rear extension (see planning ref below) if a larger kitchen/breakfast/family room is desired.

To the first floor there are four double bedrooms, with the principal bedroom enjoying a large en-suite bathroom. There is also a family bathroom and smaller fifth bedroom which could also be used as a handy separate study for those needing to work from home. Again, there is space to extend by way of a loft extension should the new buyer wish to increase the accommodation or number of bathrooms available in the home.

Planning permission has been granted for a single storey rear and first floor rear extension (planning ref pa/18047/001 to 005)

Larger than average four bedroom terraced house situated in the heart of ilford and located in a sought after area close to Valentine's Park, Gants Hill Central line station and Ilford Cross rail station. Ideal family home or a buy to let investment with buyers looking to take full advantage of the rising demand and prices in the area.

title: 5 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
A bright and spacious two bedroom duplex apartment laid out over the second and third floors of a modest, attractive low rise development next to the tranquil green space of Memorial Green and just moments from Wanstead High Street, the bustling heart of this highly sought-after East London village.

Coming in at just a shade under 800 square feet, this is an unusually generous example of London apartment living, and with the friendly village neighbourhood of Wanstead and its open green spaces so close at hand, you'll forget you're in London.

If you lived here...

You'll be stretching out in your immense lounge/kitchen, taking up almost the entire storey at over 300 square feet it's got a real studio feel with glossy blonde hardwood underfoot and designer rack lighting overhead. Wall-width windows frame leafy views and let natural light come flooding in, while the adjacent, artfully separated kitchen area is fully decked out in on-trend battleship grey cabinets, topped with contrasting cream work surfaces and home to a full complement of integrated appliances.

Upstairs (past some very handy fitted storage in the hallway) and your master bedroom's a substantial 160 square foot double with rooftop views from that semi-bay window, and hard wearing carpet underfoot. Bedroom two's a generous single, currently in use as a second reception but equally ideal for a child's room or home working space. Your bathroom is, in keeping with the generous proportions elsewhere, surprisingly spacious, pristine and white and complete with tub and separate shower cubicle.

Outside and it's readily apparent why Wanstead is so popular with families and City workers alike. The bustling High Street, just a couple of minutes on foot, is home to a diverse range of independent cafes, sumptuous gastropubs and fresh produce suppliers from an artisanal butchers to a specialist fishmonger. Snaresbrook tube station is less than five minutes away on foot and will get you directly to Liverpool Street in just sixteen via the Central line.

What else?

- The wild greenery of Epping Forest and tranquil blue waters of Eagle Pond are just a third of a mile on foot anytime you want to get back to nature.
- For your new local why not venture off the beaten track somewhat to Nightingale Lane? Just the other side of the High Street, it's home to a trio of award winning gastropubs.
- Local schools are impressive, you have eleven less than a mile away, four of which are deemed 'Outstanding' by Ofsted with the remainder rated 'Good'.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

address: Ashtree Walk Oaklands Hamlet, Chigwell IG7
detailedDescription:
Located within the desirable parkland development, Oaklands Hamlet. We are pleased to present this impressive two bedroom home. The property is set on a walkway adjacent to Hainault golf course.

Internally, the property comprises of, hallway entrance with ground floor WC. A cozy living area overlooking the golf course and colorful natural surroundings.

A fully integrated kitchen and dining area with access onto a south east facing garden.

The first floor consists of two double bedrooms, one with a built-in wardrobe and the main family bathroom.

To the rear of the garden is a gated parking area which offers an allocated car space.

Oaklands Hamlets is a parkland development, adjacent to Hainault Forest Golf Club. Residents can enjoy a central community square and 25 acres of public open space, including a new country park and a cycle path to Collier Row, as well as superb views of Canary Wharf and the surrounding countryside. Even better, the City is just 40 minutes away, making Oaklands Hamlet a convenient location to call home.

Oaklands Hamlet is well served with a variety of independent and state schools nearby. Whether your child is starting primary school or studying for their GCSEs, they are in a great place to learn and thrive. Clockhouse Primary School is located 2 miles away and includes a nursery. The Forest Academy 1.7 miles away is a mixed academy for students aged between 11-19. Redbridge College is just 3 miles away from the development offering a wide range of courses to students.

Call now to arrange a viewing!<br /><br />

Please note that this property is for sale by the Modern Method of Auction which is not to be confused with Traditional auction. The Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer-friendly method of purchase. We do not require the buyer to exchange contracts immediately, but grant 28 days to achieve exchange of contracts from the date the buyer's solicitor is in receipt of the draft contracts and a further 28 days thereafter to complete. Allowing the additional time to exchange on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to put down a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 3.6% (inclusive of VAT) subject to a minimum of £6,000 (inclusive of VAT) which secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to sign an Acknowledgment of Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Legal Pack which can be downloaded for free from the auction section of our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is generally no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by Douglas Allen powered by iam-sold Ltd.

detailedDescription:
Chain Free | Long Lease

A homely 3 bedroom apartment with private balcony and access to residents parking. Close to Wanstead Central Line station and the extremely popular Wanstead High Street.

This 4th floor corner apartment has a spacious tiled entrance hall with cloakroom, 3 double bedrooms, living / dining room with large double glazed windows leading to a sizeable tiled balcony and a well-lit fitted kitchen with breakfast bar and pantry.

The family bathroom is part-tiled and houses a classic tub and power shower with a separate WC. 3 double bedrooms each with laminate wooden flooring and double glazed windows and the entire property benefits from high ceilings and gas central heating throughout.

This versatile apartment is in an excellent location and is moments walk from Wanstead High Street, the heart of a vibrant East London Village that is bustling with cafes and restaurants. Gardner Close also benefits by being within the catchment area for several primary and secondary schools and is just minutes from The George Green and Christchurch Green parks

Local underground stations are Wanstead & Snaresbrook (at either end of the High Street) and Redbridge (just under a mile away).

Please contact Bairstow Eves Wanstead to arrange a viewing.

detailedDescription:
A Bright & Spacious First floor two double bedroom Maisonette with garden and garage close to woodford station. The property is in excellent condition throughout and comprises two double bedrooms, spacious reception, modern kitchen and bathroom, separate guest WC, and private rear garden. There is also a garage and plenty of storage facilities. The maisonette benefits from its own private entrance and low annual costs.

Book your viewing instantly online 24/7 at the Purple Bricks website.

Location: This is a fantastic location for those who need access into Stratford Westfield Centre, City or West End as Woodford Central Line is just a few minutes’ walk. Commuters can enjoy a short journey to and from work, but also the new owners can benefit from everything that London has to offer, taking advantage of the 24-hour tube service at the weekend. Snakes Lane East and Woodford Broadway have a variety of shops, cafes, restaurants, bars, and retail outlets, all adding to your day-to-day convenience. As for parks and open spaces, there is a huge choice in the local area. Schools in the area are highly regarded and range from State to Grammar, Faith and Independent. The maisonette is accessed via a slip road just off St Barnabas Road so it's easy to park.

detailedDescription:
Located in a quiet turning just a short walk to Grange Hill Central Line station and local shops and amenities is this semi-detached four bedroom family home. The property is very well maintained and has has recently had a loft conversion providing a primary bedroom with en-suite and unique to this property is a newly paved driveway with off street parking for two cars.

The ground floor provides you with a good size entrance hall, living room and study and there is a large open plan kitchen/dining/living space which could be utilised in several different ways.

The first floor has two double bedrooms a further single bedroom and a family bathroom with the second floor providing the primary bedroom with en-suite shower.

The attaractive south facing rear garden has a patio area, a raised decking area with the remainder mainly laid to lawn with shrub and flower borders.

Fairview Drive is located just off Manor Road, Chigwell and is within easy reach Grange Hill Central Line Station which offer easy access into London. Also within close proximity is the ever popular parade of shops on Brook Parade (Chigwell) and Manor Road, Chigwell with their comprehensive range of shops, boutiques, eateries and restaurants. Further local amenities include, David Lloyd Leisure Centre and Chigwell Golf Club. The area offers a range of access to primary and secondary schools, both private and state. By car M25 (junction 26) and M11 (Junction 5 - Southbound) are within easy reach.

Ref: Jagun

We are delighted to offer for sale this new build semi-detached house is in the heart of Wanstead Village. Set over three floors it has been built to a high standard throughout with a spacious reception room with a large bay window and stunning kitchen/family room with bifold doors leading on to the garden.

detailedDescription:
Detailed Description

Hansons Estates are pleased to offer this very rare opportunity to acquire this extended 4 bedroom double fronted semi-detached property located within a short walk of Seven King station, which will form part of the forthcoming Cross Rail link. We feel that this larger than average property would suit families or make an ideal investment purchase. The property compromises of four bedrooms, through lounge, additional reception room, spacious kitchen, ground floor shower room and first floor family bathroom. We feel that there is further potential to extend into the loft (subject to planning) or to convert this spacious property into an HMO (stp). The property is located within a short walk of outstanding primary and secondary schools as well as shops and leisure facilities. We do not anticipate for this larger than average property to remain on the market long so call Hansons Estates to arrange your viewing and avoid missing out.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
**ideal family home with two bathrooms, off street parking and garage, walking distance to redbridge underground station – chain free**

OneClickHomes are delighted to offer this well presented five bedrooms end of terrace house, with further potential to extend into the loft.

On the ground floor, this spacious property boasts a large through lounge, kitchen/diner with integrated appliances, 3-piece shower room, access to a stunning garden with an outhouse and you also have access to the garage via an internal door.

The first floor has five bedrooms, a 3-piece bathroom suite, and a wide landing that has access to a sizeable loft offering ample storage, which also has the potential for a loft conversion, which would allow for an additional bedroom/bathroom (Subject to planning consent).

Other benefits include off-street parking for up to three cars, garage, side access to the garden, double glazing, gas central heating, and is within close proximity to local amenities and public transport links.

Viewings are highly recommended and the property will be is sold with no ongoing chain.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Ideally located for the popular Nightingale Primary School (0.4 miles) as well as Wanstead High Street (0.7 miles) with its Central line stations, boutiques, bars and restaurants, this semi-detached family home is perfectly situated for excellent schools and an easy commute to the city. The pristine frontage gives an instantly appealing first impression and there is the added benefit of a handy driveway. Stepping inside, this home really does have the 'wow' factor. The front living room features a large bay window, whilst the feature fireplace, sets a homely charm. The ground floor living space to the rear has been redesigned to create an impressive open planned kitchen/dining room, which is full of light thanks to the two impressive sky lights. With the open plan layout, the dining room flows effortlessly into the contemporary kitchen and naturally forms the heart of the home. There is also a separate utility room, to ensure all of your white goods and cleaning products are stored neatly away and leaves the kitchen purely for entertaining in. The double doors from the dining room allows easy access to a stunning rear garden, of generous size with lawn and a raised patio, perfect for hosting BBQ's. To the first floor you will discover three good sized bedroom and a family bathroom. The principal bedroom can be found on the second floor boasting an ensuite shower room.

title: 3 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
If you are searching for a four bedroom house that is of a good size and on a quiet residential road then look no further! Charlesons present this lovely four bedroom mid terraced house to the market, with three double bedrooms, one single bedroom, one bayed reception, one dining room and a spacious kitchen. This property will not fail to accommodate the family living inside and any friends and family who come over to visit. You have the advantage of having a driveway good enough for an average size car, gas central heating, double glazed windows and a grand size garden with more than enough room to extend or build an outbuilding (subject to planning permission)

Based in Newbury Park only 0.7 miles away from Newbury Park underground station, travelling couldn't be any easier. You have access to the central line taking you to Liverpool Street thus maximising the areas you can travel to. You are surrounded by a variety of amenities such as Marks & Spencer's, diy stores, Machine mart, Mcdonald's, Banana leaf, Spice hut, aldi supermarket and many more all situated within the local area. For couples starting a family, you will have the privilege of being close to many schools for example Seven Kings School and Valentines Secondary School both holding an ofsted rating of outstanding ensuring the academic well being is catered for.

Reception:
13'9 x 13'5 (4.2m x 4.1m)
Entering the reception you are welcomed by ample space to entertain friends and family. You also have a lovely bayed window that provide more space and invites a beautiful ray of light into the property.

Dining room:
12'9 x 11'8 (3.9m x 3.6m)
Having a dining table situated in the centre of the room, this space is a great place to host family dinners and enjoy some family time together.

Kitchen:
8'6 x 7'6 (2.6m x 2.3m)
The kitchen will provided you with room to cook alone or to cook with friends and family, there is ample storage so you will not have any problems storing your spices and cooking equipment.

First floor WC:
Separated from the family bathroom, this specific feature will allow the family members to use the toilet even while the bathroom is occupied.

Bathroom:
6'6 x 4'10 (2.0m x 1.5m)
This family bathroom will give you the option to either run a relaxing bath after a long day at work or take a quick and less time consuming shower when you're on the go.

Bedroom one:
12'6 x 11'8 (3.8m x 3.6m)
Being one of the most spacious bedroom in the house and situated at the front of the property, this room will provide you with great natural lighting lifting your morning spirit.

Bedroom two:
11'5 x 10'8 (3.5m x 3.2m)
Also benefiting in size, this lovely double bedroom has ample storage space for your belongings while still leaving more than enough room to manoeuvre.

Bedroom three:
8'3 x 6'11 (2.5m x 2.1m)
With plenty of space for a single bed, this room will be perfect for a young adult or can be used as a great storage solution. In addition to the rest of the property, there is gas central heating, double glazed windows and ample storage space.

Loft bedroom:
17'2 x 14'9 (5.2m x 4.5m)
Ensuite :
7'0 x 6'1 (2.1m x 1.9m)
The loft bedroom benefits from an ensuite which allows the occupier of this room to have a bit more privacy. It will also allow you to use your own bathroom in your own time without worrying about the family schedule.

Garden:
To the rear of the property you will benefit from a grand size garden with room for an outbuilding whilst still leaving more than enough room to extend (subject to planning permission)

address: Roding Lane North, Woodford Green IG8
detailedDescription:
This spacious 2 bedroom first floor maisonette comes with a private rear garden and is well presented throughout having a modern kitchen and bathroom. The property is offered chain free and close to a local shops and amenities.

This immaculate first floor two double bedroom maisonette in Roding Lane North comes with a good size private rear garden and has had refurbishment works undertaken by the current owners, making this the perfect property to move straight into.

Upon entering the property via your own from door you instantly get a homely feel and are met by stairs to the first floor landing. This attractive property has a good size lounge/diner which is very bright and airy, there is a modern fitted kitchen and bathroom. There are two great sized bedrooms both with views onto the private rear garden.

To the exterior at the rear there is a private garden with a patio area and lawn which is perfect to enjoy those sunny days.

The property truly offers the best of both worlds, being on the cusp of amazing open greens spaces whilst at the same time having all what Woodford has to offer on its door step.
Roding Lane North is a sought after Road which is perfect for commuters who travel into London via the Central Line. Woodford and Chigwell stations goes directly into Liverpool Street and the West End stations. Also close by are Woodford Bridge shops, restaurants and coffee shops as well as other local amenities. Ray Lodge Park is a short walk which is a beautiful park, offers playing areas and tennis courts. Claybury Park is also only minutes' walk away

The property is offered chain free.

title: 2 bed bungalow for sale

detailedDescription:
A unique opportunity to acquire this spacious Edwardian terraced house boasting five double bedrooms with a through lounge, and open plan kitchen diner along with four bathrooms! Excellently located just off Ilford Lane and within a five minute walk to Ilford Town centre.

The accommodation is accessed via secure iron gates that leads into the beautifully presented front garden providing off street parking for two car minimum. The front door with its fine carved masonry arch leads you into a wide and high hallway providing access to a large open through lounge, a clean storage cellar and an open plan kitchen diner with additional lounging space. The kitchen also leads onto a ground floor bathroom suite.

To the first floor you have three large double bedrooms along with a good sized single room to the front and a family bathroom suite. The loft has been converted into two further bedrooms with an en suite.

The front garden has been paved with concrete slabs providing easy maintenance and off street parking for a minimum of two cars. The beautifully presented rear garden is mainly laid to lawn boarded with concrete paving and flower beds and has a fully powered outbuilding to the rear.

A special key feature includes the property having a huge investment appeal. The property of course benefits with gas central heating, double glazed windows and off street parking.

Location

The location is perfect- Situated close to Ilford Lane in this sought-after location, local shops, supermarkets and restaurants are found at the top of the road. Access to Ilford Station and Ilford Town Centre is literally a stone's throw away. The A406, A12, A13 and the M11 roads are within comfortable distance for those who commute via car. Another benefit also includes the property being close to local parks and schools just round the corner making it an ideal property for those with kids, someone looking for a large family home or an investor.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

Agents note - Yopa inspected this property and will be pleased to provide any additional information as may be required. title: 5 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Doorsteps are extremely pleased to market this freehold three bedroom terraced house in Wanstead area of East London.

The property is located in an area with great transport links. The A12, A13 and M11 are all within a short drive and the local tube station is Wanstead Station. The station offers Central Line services to Bank, Stratford, London Liverpool Street and more. There’s plenty of surrounding bus stop links and the area offers plenty to do with local shops and amenities on the nearby Wanstead high street.

The property itself has a private drive that allows for two cars, attracts plenty of natural light, double-glazing windows throughout, a porch entrance, CCTV, a utility room and a rear private garden.

The house is split across two levels with the ground level consisting of two reception rooms, a downstairs WC, the utility room and a modern kitchen. The first floor offers the 3 bedrooms with the family shower room.

All of the 3 bedrooms a good size and allow for double beds.

This is an excellent home that would be most ideal for families or as an investment opportunity.

Viewing is advised.

title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
Situated in Meadow Walk, a cul-de-sac positioned just off of the prestigious Drive running between South Woodford and Wanstead, this home is a short walk from Wanstead High Street and Snaresbrook Station (0.4 Miles) as well as being moments from Snaresbrook Primary School and Nursery rated good by Ofsted.

Externally the home benefits from a large driveway in addition to a front garden, integral garage and handy side access. Internally the property is spacious and offers potential for reconfiguration to the ground floor if desired. A handy porch leads you into the property's hallway and large through lounge, measuring an 27ft 5 by 11ft 11 allowing plenty of room for a lounge and separate dining area. The large conservatory to the back opens up to the kitchen allowing for either an additional reception, playroom or dining room area. The beautiful contemporary kitchen offers a range of inbuilt integrated appliances, space for an American fridge/freezer and plenty of additional cupboard space but there is potential to create a larger kitchen diner by way of incorporating the existing surrounding rooms or by way of an extension (stpc). The integral garage provides additional storage or parking space with easy access from the main property.

To the first floor there is a spacious landing leading to three bedrooms, two of which are large doubles, a generous family bathroom and an additional study. The loft has been converted into a large master bedroom, but is currently utilised as an office, with inbuilt wardrobes with an adjoining en-suite. The garden to the rear is well maintained and a pretty mix of patio and lawn with a storage shed to the rear.
