detailedDescription:
Kings Group estate agents are proud to present this beautiful two bedroom purpose built retirement property. The property is being sold on a chain free basis and comes with the added benefits of communal gardens, Communal lounge and a communal laundry room. The property is located in the gorgeous tree-lined street of Brancaster Road and has easy access to the A12 as well as Newbury Park Station. You are greeted at the property by a communal entrance. The communal lounge, conservatory, gardens and laundry room are all accessible from the main entrance. A lift provides access to the flat and a well presented corridor gives access your own front door. Through your front door you are presented with a spacious entrance hall. The entrance hall gives access to firstly a spacious and bright lounge. The lounge benefits from a sizeable window to over looks the communal gardens as well as flooding the room with natural light. A fully fitted kitchen is located off of the lounge and comes with fully tiled walls. Back into the entrance hall and you have access to two double bedrooms. Both rooms are very bright and spacious and the master bedroom benefits from built in wardrobes. Finally a fully tiled shower room is located at the end of the property and is also another very bright and spacious room. Seven Kings park is within walking distance as well as the high street so you have all local amenities right on your door step. The property is sold with the condition that residents must be over the age of 60 years of age. In the event of a couple, one must be over the age of 60 years and the other over 55 years.

detailedDescription:
Dpr is pleased to present this modern two bedroom property situated within good distance of local shops and amenities for sale in Academy Central.

The property measures 62 square meters and boasts a large master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, modern kitchen with integrated appliances, family bathroom and large private balcony to take in the views of the surrounding area.

*Cash Buyers Only*

Academy Central is superbly placed for shopping, leisure and travel. Locally Vicarage Field, in the heart of Barking town centre, offers well over fifty shops in a modern setting with high street names and local independent stores. Situated 10 minutes walk away from Goodmayes rail station there are great links available to get you into central London in under 30 minutes.

Nearby Ilford offers a Sainsburys, plus the popular Exchange Mall, with its impressive food hall and more than a hundred shops, from M&S to Debenhams. Ilford is also where you will find two national health and fitness club chains.

Durden & Hunt International Welcome to the market Sovereign House, an exclusive collection of five 1 and 2 bedroom apartments in the sought-after area of South Woodford.

Sovereign House offers residents luxurious living with apartments built to a high specification ideally situated just 1 minute walk from South Woodford train station with direct links to London and the national rail network.
Experience the perfect blend of city living, so close to the capital and yet able to retreat to one of the nearby parks and forests. Sovereign house offers ideal accommodation with all amenities on your doorstep.

Situated on the edge of East London lies the beautiful suburb of South Woodford. South Woodford is becoming increasingly popular due to its cosmopolitan feel and easy access to the City and West End (approximately 18 and 27 minutes on the Central Line.) For the motorists, South Woodford sits at the junction of the North Circular Road with the start of the M11 motorway, which begins at "Charlie Brown's Roundabout."

There is also easy access to the A1400, which merges into the A12, as well as access to the A12 from "Green Man's" roundabout and the A104 which is known as Lea Bridge Road and is a major link to areas of central London via Hackney.
With Wanstead Park, Hollow Ponds and Epping Forest all close by, you can escape the hustle and bustle of city life while being only a few short tube stops away from the central hub. South Woodford's retail and business area is centred on George Lane, the high street contains a range of independent boutiques, coffee shops, bistros, butchers, bakers, greengrocers and fishmongers. There are numerous, supermarkets with Waitrose, M&S Simply Food, Tesco Express, and Sainsbury's all present. When it comes to wining and dining, you're spoilt for choice! The restaurants, cafes and bars in South Woodford create a lively feel to the area. The eateries in E18 cater for just about every taste from Turkish to Italian to Indian to Thai. There are two main pubs in South Woodford, The Railway and The George which are well worth a visit.

For those fitness fanatics, E18 is the perfect spot as there are several gyms and yoga studios situated in the area. There is also a Virgin Active gym and a local cricket club situated in the neighbouring Woodford Green.
There are several well regarded primary schools nearby such as Oakdale Infants' School, Snaresbrook Preparatory School and Oakdale Junior School which are all of exceptionally high standard

South Woodford's retail and business area is centred on George Lane, the high street contains a range of independent boutiques, coffee shops, bistros, butchers, bakers, greengrocers and fishmongers. There are numerous, supermarkets with Waitrose, M&S Simply Food, Tesco Express, and Sainsbury's all present. When it comes to wining and dining, you're spoilt for choice! The restaurants, cafes and bars in South Woodford create a lively feel to the area. The eateries in E18 cater for just about every taste from Turkish to Italian to Indian to Thai. There are two main pubs in South Woodford, The Railway and The George which are well worth a visit.

For those fitness fanatics, E18 is the perfect spot as there are several gyms and yoga studios situated in the area. There is also a Virgin Active gym and a local cricket club situated in the neighbouring Woodford Green.
There are several well regarded primary schools nearby such as Oakdale Infants' School, Snaresbrook Preparatory School and Oakdale Junior School which are all of exceptionally high standard

detailedDescription:
FastMove are proud to present this well presented two Bedroom flat.

Guide Price - £250,000 - £260,000

Situated in this popular residential location, the property is within walking distance of local amenities including a comprehensive range of local shops, eateries and supermarkets. The property is also surrounded by a number of reputable schools.

Furthermore, the property is incredibly well served with Chadwell Heath and Goodmayes main line stations, Newbury Park central line station, numerous bus routes and excellent road links via A12 all within close proximity.

Through a doorway leads into the
Entrance hallway


The property benefits from a warm and welcoming Hallway, the perfect place for coats and shoes. Internal doors lead to the Reception room, both Bathrooms and Family Bathroom.
Lounge


The property benefits from a bright and airy reception room with space for a number of pieces of furniture, the perfect place to sit back and relax. To the one aspect of the room is a D/G window and to another aspect is a further D/G window and a set of D/G patio doors all of which flood the room with excellent levels of natural light. The patio doors lead to a Juliette balcony. There is also a wall mounted heater and the room is decorated with stylish laminate flooring.
Kitchen


The Kitchen has an array of wall and base units fitted with complimentary worksurfaces. Benefiting from a fitted electric oven with hob and overhead extractor, single sink and drainer, fridge/freezer and plumbing for a washing machine. The Kitchen also has a D/G window and is decorated with tiles to the walls and stylish flooring.
Principal bedroom


This lovely property benefits from a spacious principal Bedroom which has built in wardrobes to one aspect. There is still plenty of space for a double bed and free-standing furniture. Benefiting from a D/G window and wall mounted heater.
Bedroom two


Another spacious Bedroom with plenty of room for a double bed and free-standing furniture. Benefiting from a D/G window and wall mounted heater.
Bathroom


A well presented family Bathroom which comprises of a three-piece suite including a panelled bath with wall mounted shower head, low flush W/C and wash hand basin. The room is decorated with tiles to the walls and stylish flooring and benefits from a wall mounted heater.
Exterior


Outside the property is one allocated parking space

detailedDescription: *Guide Price £600,000 to £625,000* Located on Rivington Avenue in the popular Hill Farm Estate is this extended four bedroom semi-detached house. The property has been well maintained by its current owners and been completely refurbished to a high standard. This impressive home ticks all the boxes for family living and is awash with natural light throughout. The ground floor offers a large through lounge, separate modern kitchen, shower room with W.C and an additional room perfect for a play room or additional bedroom. Onto the first floor you find four bedrooms and family bathroom. The house further benefits from a wonderful rear garden with raised patio area perfect for entertaining, off street parking, loft space ideal for extending further (STPP) and a quiet, residential location. Rivington Avenue benefits from popular local schooling close by and is still within easy access to South Woodford amenities and Central Line Station. Commuters can get to Liverpool Street within around 20 – 25 mins, so travelling to and from work should be that little bit easier whilst there is excellent connections to A406 & M11. There is also a Tesco a short stroll away ideal for getting those last minute dinner grabs. Woodford Green is surrounded by Lakes, Epping Forest, country parks and open green spaces. This makes Woodford Green a stunning place to enjoy. (Buyer Notice: Photos used are from previous sale).

detailedDescription: *Offers In Excess Of £675,000* This well presented, three bedroom End of Terrace property is well-proportioned offering a perfect balance of living and entertainment space. Grenville Gardens is located only a short walk from Woodford Central Line station and local amenities. The property is a perfect family home and has been well maintained by its current owners. The accommodation comprises of three bedrooms, first floor family bathroom, through lounge and dining area with separate kitchen. The garden is over 100ft with additional scope to extend to the rear subjection to planning approval. Grenville Gardens is located in Woodford Green and is just off Broadmead Road, with the excellent Ray Lodge Primary School within walking distance. Ray Lodge Park is a stunning open green space with many outdoor activities for the whole family, including a play area for the kids whilst Broadmead Playing Fields and Elmhurst Gardens are short walks away offering a great place to walk the dog or play on the summer afternoons.

detailedDescription:
Caplen Estates has the pleasure in offering to the market this well presented two bedroom top floor apartment which is situated in Buckhurst Hill, Essex and offered on a Chain Free basis.

When entering the property via secure entry system the property offers a private porch leading to a large entrance hall giving access to a bespoke modern fitted kitchen with a range of units, integrated dishwasher, fridge/freezer, oven, gas hob which also houses the combi boiler. The spacious lounge/diner has double aspect windows and access to a private balcony. There are two double bedrooms with the master bedroom benefiting from built in wardrobes and a stylish fully tiled shower room. The property also includes one allocated parking space, visitor parking and is located with easy reach to Knighton Woods, Queens Road shops, restaurants, cafes and Buckhurst Hill Central Line Station. Call our sales team on to arrange a viewing.

Detailed Description

Wentworth Estates are offering for sale this Spacious Two-bedroom purpose built flat, situated on the second floor of this development. Ilford station is soon to benefit from the Cross Rail Link, making journeys into London faster and easier. Short walking distance from Ilford lane where you can benefit from local shopping, restaurants and many other entertainment facilities.

Spacious lounge with views of the front communal gardens, the lounge leads to the kitchen, which is fully fitted and has space for appliances. Ideal for the first-time buyers and the buy to let investors looking to take full advantage of the rising demand and prices in the area.

detailedDescription:
Situated in Thurlow Court, a purpose built apartment block on Wellesley Road in Wanstead's popular Village, this two bedroom ground floor flat is incredibly close to Wanstead's popular High street (0.1 Mile), with its array of shops, bars, restaurants and two Central Line Stations.

The property features a newly fitted contemporary kitchen with a range of fitted appliances and downlighting that can be controlled via remote control leading into an exceptionally large reception room spanning approximately 19ft7 in length. Like the reception room, both bedrooms have been freshly painted and newly carpeted and provide a good amount of space. The bathroom is a good size and features a walk in shower, however there is space for a bath should someone wish to reconfigure. In addition, this property offers a great deal of storage including a large storage cupboard in the entrance hall and second bedroom. This prestigious block also features a security entry phone for all properties, a communal garden and a lift to all floors, including the lower ground where there is allocated, underground gated parking.

detailedDescription:
A one bedroom retirement apartment situated on the first floor
Parkview Court was constructed by McCarthy & Stone (Developments) Ltd and comprises 52 properties arranged over 3 floors each served by lift. Situated within close proximity to Seven Kings Park and the High Street with its local amenities. The Development Manager can be contacted from various points within each property in the case of an emergency. For periods when the Development Manager is off duty there is a 24 hour emergency call system. Each property comprises an entrance hall, lounge, kitchen, one or two bedrooms and bathroom. It is a condition of purchase that residents be over the age of 60 years, or in the event of a couple, one must be over the age of 60 years and the other over 55 years. detailedDescription:
Excellent first time buyer or investment opportunity! Located in the heart of Ilford Town Centre is this one bedroom forth floor flat and within a five minute walk to Ilford Station. Uniquely surrounded with multiple restaurants, supermarkets and shops!

The property is being offered chain free.

The accommodation is accessed via a secure entry phone system with stairs leading to the forth floor. In through the front door leading into the hallway. The hallway provides access to all the rooms throughout the property. The family bathroom suite is located to the front of the property. To the rear is a large bedroom with ample of space and light along with a spacious open plan kitchen and lounge.

Some benefits include the property having the option of having a secure underground parking slot which can be registered from the concierge. For those wishing to let, tenants can also rent a parking slot if required.

Lease equates to circa 980 years.

Service Charge equates to £831 every 6 months.

Ground Rent equates to £101 pa.

Location Location Location!

The location is perfect! Situated on Hainault Street just off Ilford High Street, Ilford Rail Station is within a 5 minute walk away. Ilford Town Centre is on your doorstep providing access to over 80 high street retail shops along with having a variate of restaurants and supermarkets to choose from. The location is surrounded with further transport facilities with the A406, A12 and the M11 roads being within comfortable distance as well as having local bus services are on your doorstep providing easy access towards several different locations! Valentines Park is also a short walk away and the area is very well managed making it an ideal property for those with kids, first time buyers or an investor.

Book in a viewing today to avoid missing out!

address: Gordon Road, South Woodford, London E18
detailedDescription:
A wonderful four bedroom semi-detached house.
A lovely four bedroom semi-Detached house nestled just a short walk from South Woodford Central Line Station and local amenities.

The property is offered in the very best of condition and comprises a large lounge/diner with ample room for a six seater table and chairs. The large square bay to the front and glazed door to the garden offer an abundance of light which extenuates the high ceilings.

The downstairs further offers a modern kitchen with ample work and storage space, and opens out to a good sized and easily maintained garden which is partially decked, and has the added bonus of a summer house with lighting and power points. The is also a ground floor W/C.

On the first floor there are three bedrooms modern family bathroom.

The Sellers have extended the property up into the loft to make a very comfortable fourth bedroom with en-suite shower room.

Providing enough space for a growing family the property further boasts off street parking to the front, double glazing throughout and a chain free sale.

Here on Gordon Road you are nestled on a quiet, residential street yet perfectly positioned to benefit from a short walk to South Woodford Central Line Station as well as easy access to the A406 and M11. Residents on this road also have the wonderful amenities of South Woodford to enjoy with its bars, restaurants, boutiques shops and choice of supermarkets including Sainsbury’s, Waitrose and Marks & Spencer. This house also benefits from Tesco being just down the Road and a Maybank Food and Wine on the doorstep. With outstanding local schools, charming public green spaces and ideal commuting options this is a perfect property to make your next home.

detailedDescription:
* Guide Price £550,000 to £575,000 *
A fantastic size four bedroom mid terraced family home, situated in a quite residential turning, bright and airy and beautifully presented.

Internally this spacious property boasts a wealth of features to include an entrance hallway, lounge to front aspect, a modern fitted kitchen/breakfast room with custom fitted storage and an extended dining area to rear aspect.
The first floor comprises of two double bedrooms and a third bedroom currently arranged as a home office, as well as the family three piece bathroom suite.
The second floor benefits from a fantastic size fourth bedroom. This loft conversion includes, fitted wardrobes and ample eaves storage, there is also a separate modern shower room.
Externally the property offers a good size rear garden, which is partly paved and the rest is laid to lawn, a detached garage with electrics and a driveway to the front for off street parking.
Enjoy easy access to Fairlop and Hainault Central Line Stations taking you into London Liverpool Street Station in just 35 minutes, making this ideal for the London commuter.
Within walking distance to a variety of amenities and shopping facilities, and a short drive from both Hainault Forest Country Park and Fairlop Waters with beautiful views.
Viewings (subject to government guidelines)are highly recommended to appreciate all this property has to offer.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

Some or all information pertaining to this property may have been provided solely by the vendor, and although we always make every effort to verify the information provided to us, we strongly advise you to make further enquiries before continuing.

If you book a viewing or make an offer on a property that has had its valuation conducted virtually, you are doing so under the knowledge that this information may have been provided solely by the vendor, and that we may not have been able to access the premises to confirm the information or test any equipment. We therefore strongly advise you to make further enquiries before completing your purchase of the property to ensure you are happy with all the information provided.

The property is located within approximately 0.5 miles to Goodmayes Station and 0.7 mils to Seven Kings Station (which is part of the Crossrail project).

title: 3 bed end terrace house for sale

detailedDescription:
Churchill Estates are proud to present this bright and beautifully presented two double bedroom Victorian property positioned in the sought after location of Wanstead village. This attractive mid terraced home is situated within close proximity to both Snaresbrook (0.3 miles) and Wanstead (0.4 miles) Central Line stations and an array of local amenities on Wanstead High Street with its many shops, cafes, bars and restaurants. As you enter the property you are immediately greeted to views of the garden through the stylish open plan kitchen/diner and a cosy front reception with an ornate period fire place. Following through the hallway this property boasts a unique exposed brick wall and original floorboards that lead you onto a useful storage room currently being used as a utility. Next to this you have a tastefully finished four piece bathroom suite, with stand-alone roll top bath and individual shower cubicle. The rear of the property has been extended, incorporating a stunning kitchen/diner which is flooded with natural light from a sizeable sky light above and bi fold doors that lead out to a delightful rear garden with space that is perfect for the fast approaching summer months. The first floor comprises two generous double bedrooms each with original feature fire places with the front bedroom including an additional built in storage cupboard. This property has been maintained to an incredibly high standard throughout by the current vendors with the decor and presentation resulting in charming and welcoming home. For further details or an appointment to view please contact the office at your earliest convenience.

Two Bedroom - Freehold

detailedDescription: Keaton’s are delighted to bring this superb double-fronted Victorian house to market. Set within a substantial plot the property has been owned by the same family since 1947 and offers a seldom available opportunity to own one of the most prestigious houses in Wanstead. The property offers living space in excess of 4,000 square feet arranged over three floors and including three reception rooms and also has a rear garden extending in excess of 175 feet. Located on the always well regarded Grove Park the house is just moments away from Wanstead High Street and within easy reach of both Wanstead and Snaresbrook Underground Stations with direct access to both The City and The West End.

detailedDescription:
Once inside this family home one can fully appreciate the space on offer with extensions to both the ground floor and loft. A welcoming entrance hallway serves two reception rooms. The sitting room with ceiling rose and coving and a bay window ensuring the room is flooded by natural light. The extended family room/dining room offers plenty of space for dining and relaxing and enjoys garden views from the patio doors. The kitchen, which has also been extended, is fitted with a range of light wood cabinets with some integrated appliances.

On the first floor there are three bedrooms, two doubles and a single plus the family bathroom with white suite. The second floor features the principle bedroom with an en-suite shower room.

The rear garden has a patio area, lawn and a large Garden Room with en-suite shower room ideal for use as a playroom, gym or home office.

detailedDescription:
Within walking distance of Gants Hill Station, this property has been extended to provide a modern kitchen diner, a spacious through lounge, a ground floor shower room/ W.C. And a large entrance hall with a front porch. The four bedrooms (three are doubles) and the other two bathrooms are located over the two upper floors. With a front driveway providing parking and an outbuilding (connected to wifi and plumbing) at the rear of the garden with rear access via the shutter doors. Additional features for this property are the under floor heating beneath the kitchen's porcelain tiles and the engineered wood throughout the rest of the ground floor. There is a mega flow system in place for the three bathrooms and central heating system. With a part patio and part lawn garden to the rear leading to the outbuilding. Viewing is recommended to fully appreciate this property.

Three bathrooms

An attractive four bedroom detached family home close to Hainault Station and local amenities. This well maintained property offers two reception rooms, a separate kitchen, conservatory, utility room and garage on the ground floor and upstairs there are four good sized bedrooms and a family bathroom. The front of the property has driveway parking and access to the garage. To the rear there is a good sized garden mainly laid to lawn with shrub borders, side access and an out building which has been previously used as an annex .

Wickets Way is located within easy reach of Hainault Station which offers easy access into London. Also within close proximity is the ever popular parade of shops on either Brook Parade, Chigwell or Manford Way, Chigwell. Further local amenities include recreational fields with tennis courts and park, Virgin Active Chigwell and Tescos Express Manford Way.

The area offers a range of access to primary and secondary schools, both private and state.

detailedDescription:
Sandra Davidson are pleased to offer for sale this well presented, extended, double fronted, end terrace, family home on a much sought after turning in Redbridge. This well presented home features; A Through Lounge Reception, extended kitchen diner and shower room on the ground floor, with five bedrooms and family bathroom on the first floor, To the rear of the property is a 43' rear garden with off street parking for multiple cars to the front on own paved driveway. The property is situated within the Redbridge and Beal school catchment area with easy access to redbridge underground station.

This outstanding home can only be appreciated by an internal inspection. The property comprises:-

Entrance

Via double glazed door into entrance hall with; wood flooring, radiator, light, stairs to first floor, doors to:

With up and over door to front, tiled flooring, light, fitted cupboard housing boiler and mega-flo tank, water softener

Suite comprising; p-Shaped bathtub with shower screen and shower over, hand wash basin inset to vanity, low level WC with hidden cistern, tiled walls and flooring, radiator, light, double glazed window to rear

As the seller?s sole agents we are pleased to offer for sale, this ground floor One Bedroom retirement flat with its own patio area plus use of the communal gardens. This property is for over 60?s only and is conveniently located for local transport links and a range of local shopping facilities. Accommodation offers a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes, a bathroom which is equipped for emergency assistance, a bright and airy lounge which provides access to the private patio area and a fitted kitchen.

Additional benefits include an on-site Warden, emergency assistance cords throughout the property, a large communal lounge, an on-site hairdresser, beautifully maintained gardens and visitor parking on site. A lovely well managed atmosphere. Offered Chain Free, Guide price 160,000 - 170,000 for the leasehold interest.

Full description:

The Express Estate Agency is proud to offer this Four Bedroom Detached Bungalow – all interest and offers are invited.

Internal:
Entrance Hall - Front door opens to. With stair access to First Floor and doors to;
Lounge - Generous sized lounge area with fitted feature fireplace and wooden flooring throughout. With ample space for a range of furniture and bay window to front aspect bringing natural lighting.
Kitchen - Modern kitchen area fitted with a range of wall and base units, including integral oven, four ring gas hob and overhead extraction fan. Kitchen boasts fitted tile flooring and splash back tile walls.
Dining Room - Good sized room currently utilised as a dining area with plenty of space for furniture, fitted wooden flooring and bay window to front aspect.
Bedroom One - Double sized bedroom with fitted wooden flooring and space for additional furniture. Door opening to;
En-Suite - 3 Piece Suite comprising; Walk-in shower enclosure area accessed via gate with overhead shower tap. Low level WC and wash hand basin. With fully fitted tile walls.
Conservatory - Extensive conservatory area well presented with both rear aspect and skylight windows bringing natural lighting. With ample space for a range of furniture and fitted tile gloss flooring.
Shower Room - 3 Piece Suite comprising; Shower enclosure with overhead mixer tap and surrounding tile walls. Low level WC and wash hand basin.
Cloakroom - With wash hand basin and ample space for storage.

First Floor Landing - Doors to;
Bedroom Two - Double sized bedroom with fitted wardrobe/storage cupboards and wooden flooring throughout. Window bringing natural lighting.
Bedroom Three - Double sized bedroom with fitted wooden flooring and space for additional furniture. Window bringing natural lighting.
Bedroom Four - Double sized bedroom with fitted wooden flooring and space for additional furniture. Window bringing natural lighting.
Bathroom - 4 Piece Suite comprising; Shower enclosure with overhead mixer tap and surrounding tile walls. Low level WC, bidet and wash hand basin.

External:
Rear Garden - Extensive rear garden mainly laid to lawn with paved patio areas. Ample space for a range of outdoor furniture, plant beds and shrubbery. Garden is well-maintained with shrubs surrounding.
Driveway - Spacious block paved driveway to front of property providing off road parking for multiple vehicles and leading to;
Garage - Single space garage with up and over door.

Early viewing is highly recommended due to the property being realistically priced.

detailedDescription:
Five Well Proportioned Bedrooms - Prestigious Repton Park Development -Duplex Apartment - Two Modern Bathrooms, One Of Which Is En-Suite - Spacious Reception Room - Large Kitchen/Dining Area With Integrated Appliances - Onsite Virgin Active Gym And Spa - 24 Hour Security - Secure Gated Parking - Large Garden - Boasting At Nearly 2500sqft - Chain Free

Five Well Proportioned Bedrooms - Prestigious Repton Park Development - Duplex Apartment - Two Modern Bathrooms, One Of Which Is En-Suite - Spacious Reception Room - Large Kitchen/Dining Area With Integrated Appliances - Onsite Virgin Active Gym And Spa - 24 Hour Security - Secure Gated Parking - Multiple Parking Spaces - Chain Free - Boasting At Nearly 2500sqft

Durden & Hunt welcome to the market this impressive five bedroom apartment located in the exclusive gated development, Repton Park. Repton Park is a well sought after development set in acres of picturesque communal gardens and landscaped grounds .Other benefits of this luxury community include CCTV, 24-hour concierge, night time security guards patrolling the grounds and an exclusive Virgin Active Spa and Gym.

This stunning property boasts a sizeable lounge with a feature fireplace and paneled walls, a modern kitchen/dining area with integrated appliances. As well as this there is a second spacious dining room, two luxury bathrooms and a double bedroom. Continuing through this beautifully presented property, on the upper floor there is further four bedrooms with fitted wardrobes. Alternatively, one of the bedrooms can also be used as a dressing room.

Externally this superb duplex apartment benefits from a well presented rear garden and a communal garden. Furthermore the prestigious Repton Park Development is within reach of central line stations that provide direct access to Central London, as well as local shops and amenities.

Consumer Protection from Unfair Trading Regulations 2008.

Any reference to distance to Stations, amenities or schools are taken from portal estimated distances, buyers are advised to do their own research on distances and these area given as guides. Buyers must check the availability of any property and make an appointment to view before embarking on any journey to see a property. Durden & Hunt are a proud member of the Property Ombudsmen.

detailedDescription:

We are delighted to present this spacious Three Bedroom Mid-Terrace House located in the desirable area of Woodford Green, Essex. The property offers an ideal family home with ample living space. The property comprises: Three bedrooms, family bathroom with bath, large living room, kitchen/diner, downstairs toilet/shower & ample storage. title: 3 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
* Guide Price £675,000 - £700,000 *
This well presented five/six bedroom family home has been fully refurbished by the current owners. There is a double storey side extension as well as full width rear extension to maximise living space.

The property offers an open plan living/kitchen area, three further reception rooms which could be used as bedrooms and a shower room to the ground floor. To the first floor there are five good size bedrooms, a family bathroom as well as an en-suite to the master bedroom. Externally there is a private rear garden and off road parking to the front.

Maybank Road is a residential turning perfectly situated within walking distance to South Woodford tube station (Central Line) as well as George Lane's vast array of shops, bars and restaurants.

Churchfields primary school is close by, currently rated "Outstanding" by Ofsted.

A number of road links are close by including the A406, A12 and M11 as well as the open green spaces and scenery of Epping Forest.

Viewings can be booked 24 hours a day and an internal viewing is highly recommended.

Disclaimer For Virtual Viewings

detailedDescription:
Once inside this family home the generously sized rooms can be fully appreciated, the ceiling coving, dado rails and original wooden doors adding to the charm. A welcoming entrance hallway with attractive tiled flooring serves two reception rooms; a spacious sitting room with large bay window and an elegant dining room with French doors, both with fireplaces. The kitchen is fitted with light wood cabinets and features a Range style gas/electric cooker with Rangemaster extractor hood above. A large conservatory/utility room with tiled floor runs across the rear of the house providing useful office space if required.

On the first floor there are three bedrooms, two with fitted wardrobes, the master with cast iron fireplace. A family bathroom with both bath and shower completes the accommodation.

The good sized rear garden is mainly lawned with mature shrub borders. There is a handy shed and a pretty summerhouse at the rear, both with power and light. The frontage provides off road parking.

This 2 bedroom retirement apartment is located with this exclusive Village Heights Development. The property is in immaculate condition throughout and finished to a high standard. Offers a luxury fitted kitchen, large lounge, balcony with views over woodland, double bedroom with dressing room, further bedroom and modern shower room.

Guide Price £350,000 - £375,000

This stunning property is located on a ground floor and benefits from a large lounge with dining area, balcony which gives direct access to landscaped gardens with views over woodland, luxury fitted kitchen, shower room and a double bedroom with fitted wardrobes and further bedroom. The property is in immaculate condition and is finished to a spectacular standard.
Village Heights is a very popular development for downsizers due to its convenient location to Woodford High Road and amenities. Village Heights is a retirement development set in landscaped gardens enhanced by lawns and mature trees whilst featuring an upper and lower pond separated by a rock garden. The development offers a lift to all floors, communal area, security video entry phone system and a house manager. For periods when the residential house manager is off duty there is a 24 hour emergency careline response system.
It is a condition of purchase that residents be over the age of 65 years or the statutory retirement age, aged 55 or over and retired from their principle occupation or profession or who are the surviving spouse or such person.

title: 3 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Rare to the market is this double fronted 4 bedroom detached house which is located in popular Landscape Road and is ideal family home. A short walk to Woodford Station, open green spaces and popular schools. Offers an attractive wrap around garden and off street parking

Guide Price £750,000 - £800,000

This unique double frontage family house is located in this premier part of Woodford Green and is set in popular Landscape Road.

The house is full of charm and has been well maintained by its current owners. As soon as you set foot in the property it offers a friendly and warm welcoming feel.

The property offers many features including a log burner in the lounge which creates a lovely atmosphere and a perfect place to relax with the whole family. The property offers good size accomadtion with its 25ft which is split into a sociable sitting room and dining area, fully-fitted kitchen, second reception room and ground floor W.C.
The first floor has 4 bedrooms and a modern family bathroom.

The landscaped garden has been very well maintained with artificial lawn and patio area, where you can enjoy BBQs and the summer sun. There is a raised decking area with seating and shelter which is perfect for entertaining.

The property offers the best of both worlds, being on the cusp of amazing open green spaces, whilst at the same time having all that Woodford has to offer on its doorstep.
The property also benefits from having a car port and off street parking.

Landscape is a sought after location which is perfect for commuters who travel into London via the Central Line. Woodford station is only a few minutes' walk and goes directly into Liverpool Street (20mins) and the West End (27 mins). Also close by are the array of restaurants, independent shops and supermarkets on The Broadway, and other local amenities.

A few words from the owner...………
Living at 12 Landscape Road the past 6 years has been an absolute pleasure for us as a family. The location of our home has allowed our children to attend the highly sought after Churchfields Infants and Junior school. Not only did we have the option of them attending Churchfields, but we also had the option of other outstanding primary and secondary schools.
The community and great relationships with our neighbours have been the perfect complement to the quiet road the house faces on to as it has allowed the kids to cycle and play outside with freedom and peace of mind.
And last but not least the actual house, we have loved living here as the house has various living spaces - a wonderful log burner that forms part of many a family night, a kitchen that allows for great cooking and company, and a garden that supports our love for the outdoors and all kinds of sport. We hope the next owners will be just as happy as we were.

title: 2 bed terraced house for sale

detailedDescription:
An elegant 4 bedroom, 4 bathroom Victorian townhouse in a first class location. The house has just been renovated to an exceptional standard and offers many contemporary features.

Location

South Woodford tube station 0.8 mile, Stratford station 7 miles, Bancroft's School 1.6 miles, Forest School 1.5 miles

Derby Road is a popular residential street ideally placed for local amenities. There is a comprehensive range of shops, restaurants and bars nearby and excellent transport links into London. There are several well regarded state and primary schools within easy reach and good leisure facilities.

Description

This renovated Victorian townhouse perfectly reflect modern living requirements and offers outstanding accommodation arranged over three floors, complemented by off road parking, generous garden and a first class location. The house has been renovated to the highest standards incorporating many modern conveniences including:-

. Quality underfloor heating in the bathrooms which gives excellent control at a low running cost

. Kitchen/breakfast/living room with the latest Neff appliances,

. TV and satellite connection in all rooms

The ground floor comprises a light and airy reception room accessed from the hallway which also leads to the guest cloakroom. Of particular note is the wonderful kitchen/dining/family room which occupies the entire rear of the house. The kitchen offers a range of quality fitted cupboards and integrated appliances. The living/dining area has a lantern ceiling light which floods the room with natural light and seamlessly flows via fully retractable bifold doors to the large patio area ideal for barbeques bringing the outside inside.

The first and second floors offer four large bedroom suites with quality shower/bathrooms.

The house has a paved driveway with parking to the front and side access to the rear garden with a paved patio and lawn.

Square Footage: 1828 sq ft

title: 3 bed detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Positioned on the tree-lined Halstead Road, this characterful Victorian home is a short walk to Wanstead High Street (0.3 miles), both Wanstead and Snaresbrook Stations (0.4 miles and 0.6 miles respectively) as well as a range of fantastic nursery and primary schools. With a classic exposed brick façade and attractive bay window the home creates an immediately inviting first impression.

The formal lounge to the front of the property has been cleverly separated by way of double doors that can be opened up to create one large entertaining area with the dining and kitchen. The exposed brick fireplace and wooden flooring that runs through the entirety of the ground floor living area provides a warmth and striking juxtaposition against the crisp white walls. The kitchen/diner is naturally bright thanks to the large bi-fold doors that open up the rear of the home to the garden and allows plenty of space for a dining suite as well as a fantastic amount of space for kitchen storage and integrated appliances. There is also a handy W.C to this floor.

To the first floor there are two double bedrooms, the larger of which has plenty of inbuilt storage space, and a family bathroom that is accessed via a handy dressing/office space, but this could be altered to create a larger bathroom if desired. The loft has been converted to offer a third double bedroom with en-suite shower room. The rear garden has been designed to offer both a raised deck and rear patio area with central lawn and surrounding flower beds and benefits from side access allowing bikes and garden waste to be taken conveniently down the side of the house.

detailedDescription:
We are pleased to offer this 1930s spacious 3 bed family home 2/3 minutes to Hainault Station so ideal for any commuter. Would suit anyone looking to upsize or with a growing family. Downstairs consists of 2 reception rooms, fitted kitchen, a garden and a bright hallway. Upstairs you will find 3 bedrooms and a bathroom. Freehold terraced house down a quiet cul-de-sac road. This is a much sought after road so viewing is a must. Close to local amenities, buses, schools. You will also be in the catchment area for local grammar schools. Close proximity to Fairlop Waters and Hainault Forest Country Park and local parks You have everything you need but only a stone’s throw away. Front driveway for 2 cars and the rear garden has the added bonus of a garage located at the back accessed via a private road. Doubled glazed throughout, central heating and not forgetting a loft which can be converted into a further room.

0.1 miles from Hainault Station

0.5 miles from Fairlop Station

0.6 miles from Grange Hill Station

20 minutes to Stratford

30 minutes to Liverpool Street

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Rumoured to have once accommodated the Duke of Wellington, Elm Hall, an imposing Grade II listed property, is one of the earliest surviving properties from the time of Wanstead House. This early Georgian home now houses six apartments. To the front of the property Elm Hall exhibits all the features associated with grand homes of this period and stepping inside, the immaculate oak panelled communal hallway and grand staircase, give this home a real sense of class.

The accommodation is comprised of a charming open planned lounge/kitchen/dining room that is brimming with character thanks to the two large Georgian sash windows, with original shutters, stunning wood panelling and impressive solid wood floor that runs throughout. The large double bedroom enjoys viewings over the peaceful communal gardens, whilst the panelled bathroom features a stunning roll top bath and an abundance of natural light. The property further benefits from a share of the freehold, allocated gated parking, use of a large cellar and communal garden. Wanstead High Street and Station is a short 0.2 mile walk away.

Reception room 15' 3" x 14' (4.65m x 4.27m)

bedroom 14' x 10' 6" (4.27m x 3.2m)

address: Tuscany House, Medici Close, Ilford IG3
detailedDescription:
FastMove are proud to present this well presented two Bedroom first floor flat.

Situated in this popular residential location, the property is close to a number of local amenities including a comprehensive range of shops, and eateries. The property is also surrounded by a number of reputable schools, including, Eastcourt Independent School and Chadwell Health Academy.

Furthermore, the property is incredibly well served with Goodmayes station (Crossrail), Newbury Park underground and numerous bus routes within close proximity, The A12 is also only a short journey away, Through a doorway leads into the
Entrance hallway


The property benefits from a warm and welcoming Hallway, the perfect place for coats and shoes. Benefiting from a spacious storage cupboard, wall mounted radiator and internal doors leading to the Lounge, both Bedrooms and Family Bathroom.
Lounge


The property benefits from a bright and airy reception room with space for a number of pieces of furniture, the perfect place to sit back and relax. To the front aspect of the room are a set of D/G patio doors allowing excellent levels of natural light and leading to a balcony. There is a wall mounted radiator.
Kitchen


The Kitchen has an array of wall and base units fitted with complimentary worksurfaces. The Kitchen benefits from a fitted electric oven with four ring gas hob and overhead extractor, single sink and drainer, space for a fridge/freezer and plumbing for a washing machine. The Kitchen is decorated with tiles to the walls and stylish flooring.
Principal bedroom


This lovely property benefits from a spacious principal Bedroom which has built in wardrobes to one aspect. There is still plenty of space for a double bed and free-standing furniture. Benefiting from a D/G window and wall mounted and radiator.
Bedroom two


Another spacious Bedroom with plenty of room for a bed and free-standing furniture. Benefiting from a D/G window and wall mounted radiator.
Bathroom


A spacious family Bathroom which comprises of a three-piece suite including a panelled, low flush W/C and wash hand basin. The room is decorated with tiles to the walls and stylish flooring and benefits from a wall mounted radiator.
Exterior


Outside the property is one allocated parking space.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription: This immaculate four bedroom, Victorian family home offers a wealth of period features balanced with a contemporary finish for modern family living. The property is ideally nestled on a quiet, residential street and yet is within walking distance of the Woodford High Road, Broadway amenities and underground station. The ground floor comprises of a bright and airy hallway leading onto the lounge⁄dining room awash with natural light and oozing features from the bay window and period fireplace with slate hearth to the high ceilings. Further down the hallway leads to the wonderful kitchen with space for casual dining with a back door leading to the rear garden. The first floor offers three double bedrooms with the original master bedroom spanning the width of the house as well as benefiting from a built in wardrobe, and a family bathroom. The second floor is home to the impressive master bedroom with a bespoke walk-in wardrobe leading to a shower room benefiting underfloor heating and walk-in rainwater shower. This impressive home further boasts a charming front garden with restored quarry tiled pathway and a paved patio in the rear garden ideal for entertaining, leading to a raised lawn. With Woodford Central Line Station only a short walk away and parents being well catered for with outstanding schools close by as well as the beautiful area with forests, lakes, country parks and open green spaces this really is a charming home ready for its next family.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Located within a popular school catchment, this newly refurbished four bedroom house spans three floors and features off street parking, a modern and contemporary kitchen/diner leading out to a sizeable mature south-west facing rear garden, plus the offer of a quick move thanks to no onward chain.

Located within a popular school catchment, this newly refurbished four bedroom house spans three floors and features off street parking, a modern and contemporary kitchen/diner leading out to a sizeable mature south-west facing rear garden, plus the offer of a quick move thanks to no onward chain.

Originally a part of the house next door, and newly developed within the past 10 years, this home has been internally refurbished internally to include updated plumbing, a new boiler, updated wiring and two new bathrooms. There's plenty to like about this home, so let's walk you through the layout.

Upon entry via a reclaimed stained-glass front door, the hallway gives access to the front living room, a ground floor utility room with w.c. Then at the end of the property, the centre-piece kitchen/diner with high gloss wall and base units, double sink with spring neck pull out hose, Smeg ranger freestanding cooker. In what will likely become the hub of the home, this room provides space for the family to sit down and dine, spent time, lunch or brunch; with Bifold doors leading you out to a mature south-west facing garden.

Upstairs on the first floor, there's a family bathroom, two double bedrooms plus a reasonably sized single, which could become the nursery or perhaps an office for those of you working from home.

From this level, a further set of stairs takes you up to the loft, and home to bedroom number four, plus another bathroom, giving this home two bathrooms with a total of three w.c.'s

At the start of the garden is a decking area on which to enjoy the afternoon and evening sunshine, with a glass of something cold, and beyond this a lawn garden with bedded borders, back and right.

Sellers comments……..
'Wanstead is great village setting but very close and easily accessible to central London. Gordon road has held many street parties and there is a strong neighbourly community'

For more information, or to arrange a closer look, please contact our sales team.

detailedDescription:
Take advantage of the stamp duty holiday |

Brian Thomas Estate Agents present to the market this exceptional, chain free and fully extended five bedroom terraced family home. With fitted solar panels, a generous rear garden with large outbuilding, underfloor heating and off street parking, this property must be seen!

The ground floor of this high spec property comprises a separate reception which can be opened up into a spacious through lounge via bifold doors, a second reception room, a ground floor WC and a large airy and fully extended kitchen/diner with further bifold doors leading to the generous rear garden. Four bedrooms and the family bathroom are situated on the first floor with the fifth and final bedroom with a shower room completing the property on the second floor.

The property benefits from many incredible features such as fitted solar panels, underfloor heating on the ground floor, imported double glazed windows with built in blinds, off street parking with a dedicated charging point for electric vehicles, a generous 90ft rear garden with huge double outbuilding and finally, fitted CCTV and alarm systems.

The property is also located within walking distance to Seven Kings tfl Rail Station, allowing convenient access into The City and beyond with local shops, supermarkets, schools and parks all also within walking distance.

title: 4 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
A perfectly placed one bedroom ground floor semi detached apartment in leafy South Woodford with open plan living space and a garage. The property comes chain free for simplicity and you're enviably located just moments from the gorgeous green spaces of Epping Forest; ideal for getting back to nature.

While you'll never tire of the friendly and peaceful neighbourhood of South Woodford and the amenities of George Lane, it's great to know how easy it is to get into central London. The tube is barely ten minutes' walk from your new home, and will whisk you directly to Liverpool Street in sixteen minutes or Tottenham Court Road in twenty five, putting the City and West End both within easy reach.

If you lived here

You'll love the red brick frontage and the cherry trees around your new abode, as well as drivers having their own private garage and easy access to the North Circular in a mere five minutes. The lounge/ diner comes in at a spacious 180 square feet with engineered hardwood flooring underfoot, a large window beckoning in a wealth of natural light and plenty of space for dining.

To the rear your kitchen's decked out in a flawless white suite of cabinets, integrated appliances and smart ebony worktops. Into the hallway and the bathroom comes with a shower over its teardrop tub and a traditional white suite, while lastly your bedroom's a solid double of 100 square feet ready and waiting for you to add your own designer flourishes.

Not only is South Woodford close at hand with George Lane catering for every taste, but venture further afield and you're a mere a six minute cycle from the endless charms of Wanstead. Plus you're surrounded by a wealth of green space with Epping Forest a mere four minute walk. And then there's The Doughnut; seven minutes from your front door, it's a hidden gem of a park beautiful in buttercups and perfect for relaxing, walking furry friends or exercising.

What else?

- Date night? Locals' favourite Sakura Sushi & Buns is well worth the sixteen minute walk for delectable soft shell crab tempura buns.
- Six minutes on foot will see you to the Odeon South Woodford, a stately Art Deco building bursting with blockbusters.
- Your new local could be The Gallery Bar and Brasserie which serves up the best modern British dishes in a relaxed dining atmosphere. It's just eight minutes on foot.

Reception Room (3.36m x 4.95m (11'0" x 16'2" ))

Bedroom (2.73m x 3.90m (8'11" x 12'9" ))

Kitchen (2.95m x 1.97m (9'8" x 6'5" ))

Bathroom (1.71m x 2.17m (5'7" x 7'1" ))

Explore our 'Wonders of Wanstead' pages for everything this picturesque part of East London has to offer.

Just 18 minutes direct from Liverpool Street, the long high street nevertheless has a real village feel with a great range of fine pubs and restaurants.

Off the beaten track, Wanstead is a place of peaceful avenues, open green spaces and generously proportioned properties.

With prices still amongst the capital's more affordable, Wanstead is proving a popular destination for those looking to upscale and first time buyers alike.

Situated within this popular development, built by Weston Homes, is this beautifully presented Two-Bedroom First Floor Apartment featuring an individual design and 796.4sqft of accommodation.

detailedDescription:
A re-decorated one bedroom retirement apartment situated on the ground floor.
Anglia Court was constructed by Nationwide Housing Trust Ltd and comprises 33 properties arranged over 3 floors each served by lift. Situated opposite the Railway Station and within close proximity to the High Street with its Post Office, Banks and Shops and is also on the Bus Route to Romford and Ilford. The Development Manager can be contacted from within each property in the case of an emergency. For periods when the Development Manager is off duty there is a 24 hour Appello emergency call system. Each property comprises an entrance hall, lounge, kitchen, one or two bedrooms and bathroom. It is a condition of purchase that residents be over the age of 55 years. Please speak to our Property Consultant if you require information regarding “Event Fees” that may apply to this property.

title: 3 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Three Oaks are pleased to offer for sale with no onward chain this 4 double bedroom, 3 bathroom, duplex penthouse apartment set within The Manor, a gated block within the prestigious gated Repton Park Development

The master bedroom has French doors to balcony overlooking the communal gardens and London skyline and there is an en-suite bathroom.

There are three further bedrooms and 2 family bathrooms.

The large lounge with balcony has views over the grounds and London skyline

Large kitchen with dining area.

There is underground parking for 2 cars with lift access to all apartment floors and steps from the parking area leading up to the stunning grounds with benches to sit and enjoy the peace of the gardens.

This property is offered with no onward chain

Repton Park in a unique and impressive private gated development which offers over 200 acres of mature parkland, 24 hour concierge, Pavilion Nursery, Virgin active exclusive Spa Gym and Organic Cafe.

Woodford Green is situated in the London Borough of Redbridge and Repton Park is close to the central line where the journey to Oxford Circus from Woodford Station is approximate 30 minutes. The area is also close to the beautiful green belt area of Epping Forest where horse riding and nature walks are very popular. The area of Woodford Green also consists of a mix of lovingly designed modern buildings which blend well with the grand Victorian homes creating harmony.

The area also has great access to primary and secondary schools, both private and state and the London Borough of Redbridge schools still offer the 11 + exams and has two grammar schools.

Transport is key and the links by to the M25 (junction 26) and M11 (Junction 5 - Southbound) are within easy reach as too are the A406 and A12 into London and the City. There is good public transport too with local buses and the Central Line.

detailedDescription:
**guide price £425,000 - £435,000** Tucked away at the bottom of Queen Mary Avenue you will find this spacious two bathroom apartment. The large balcony has an east-facing aspect, allowing you to soak up the morning sun before your day starts with minimal foot traffic passing through below. The flat offers a spacious and light feel, starting with a large, open entrance hall. There is an l-Shaped lounge/diner with the kitchen separated around the corner which lends the room to feel larger than other flats within the development. Both bedrooms are generous double rooms, one having an ensuite and built-in wardrobes. Further benefits include a secure parking space, 24 hour concierge, secure camera entry system and well maintained communal gardens perfect for a lockdown walk. For those of you with pets, they are allowed within the block subject to application to the freeholder. South Woodford tube station and the bustling High Street are just a short walk from the apartment.

detailedDescription:
Churchill Estates are pleased to present a truly beautiful example of a Double Bayed Four Bedroom Edwardian Family Home located in a sought after residential turning within only moments of two local Parks and sought after schooling. This much loved home offers charm and character synonymous with the period and features a welcoming mosaic tiled entrance hall, cellar, ornate Skylight window and South facing Balcony accessed from the Master Bedroom. In addition to the original features the property also boasts modern contemporary additions including a stylish fitted Kitchen/Breakfast Room, contemporary Bathroom and separate Shower Room. Externally the property boasts a great size rear garden with potential for extension as does the loft space and the front garden now benefits from the convenience of Off Street Parking.

detailedDescription:
Surrounded by beautiful, well-maintained communal gardens with seating areas, both communal and visitors parking and within close proximity of many bus routes, it is clear why Ennerdale Court proves so popular with residents. The property is fully managed and benefits from an on-site manager with an emergency 24 hour Careline System for out of hour assistance, communal lounge and a guest suite which is perfect for visiting family members.

Once inside the apartment one can fully appreciate the well presented accommodation.
The entrance hallway has two handy storage cupboards and serves a spacious sitting room which boasts a feature fireplace, giving the room a cosy feel, and a patio door giving direct access to the garden.

The kitchen is fitted with white high gloss cabinets with contrasting work surfaces. Appliances include oven, microwave, hob, fridge freezer and washer/dryer.

The double bedroom has fitted wardrobes ensuring plenty of storage space. A modern shower room is fitted with a white suite comprising of a large shower, vanity unit, w.c. And heated towel rail.

Externally are well presented gardens and communal parking spaces. The apartment is offered with no onward chain.

This is a fantastic opportunity to own a rare to the market two bedroom purpose built flat with garage on the popular Swift House, Chigwell Road, E18

You'll be immediately impressed as you enter the property and enjoy its practical living space.

The flat benefits from two double bedrooms, a three piece bathroom suite, fitted kitchen and spacious reception room

Further features include Garage en block, ample amounts of storage space and the property is offered to the market with no onward chain!

Location
Located close to convenient transport links with South Woodford Station (Central Line) being 0.2 miles away which has direct access into the City of London. It will also take you directly to Liverpool Street in just under 18 minutes!

The flat is well located for schools with many primary & secondary schools being close by which are rated 'Good' or 'Outstanding' in their most recent Ofsted reports.

Stratford City and Westfield Shopping Centre are also only a short drive away.

detailedDescription:
This stunning apartment has been subject to modernisation in recent years resulting in spacious, bright and airy open plan living accommodation set over two floors.

Once inside one can immediately appreciate the superb accommodation on offer which commences with an entrance hallway with useful mirrored storage cupboard and entry phone. The open plan kitchen/sitting room enjoys garden views to the rear through the shuttered double glazed windows giving the room a modern feel.

The kitchen area is fitted with a comprehensive range of white high gloss cabinets. Integrated appliances include microwave, dishwasher and washing machine. This area provides plenty of space for entertaining and relaxing enhanced by the suspended mood lighting above the breakfast bar.

On the first floor there are two good sized bedrooms, both with plantation shutters, the principal with fitted wardrobes. A luxury family bathroom with white suite, boasts both claw foot bath and separate shower enhanced by a school style radiator with towel rail and a pretty tiled floor.

Externally are communal gardens which are laid to lawn and provide plenty of space for relaxing on summer days. Parking on Cambridge Road is by way of Resident parking and visitor permits.

The property comes with a share of the freehold and has a lease term of 999 years remaining from 24th June 1971.

title: 3 bed detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
Deceptively spacious 4 bedroom link detached on a quiet road in Chigwell. A beautifully designed property from top to bottom. An array of hidden gems inside from 2 glorious bathrooms, separate W/C, 2 large reception rooms, low maintenance garden and garage.

Guide price: £700,000 - £750,000

Finding the write descriptive words for this property is going to be hard! Entering through your front door into the porch is where we begin, leave your coats and shoes here and out the way before you enter into the hallway. You will notice the perfection as soon as you come through the door.

Let’s start to the right hand side of the staircase, a large family reception room, currently used as the 'adults room' a sense of calm greets you. Your whole back wall is taken up with the back of the 'L' shaped sofa and you still have tons of room spare. Check out the rest area on the window ledge, a perfect spot to enjoy a book or a glass of wine perhaps?

Back into the hallway, past your stunning W/C which includes an infinity mirror and into the Kitchen/dinning/reception room. A large family table positioned out the way of the main area leaving you plenty of room in your integrated kitchen to get to work. Off the kitchen is where you will see the second reception room, spacious enough for the kids to enjoy and perfect for this summer months as you have direct access to your garden via the sliding doors.

Completing the downstairs is the first bathroom, complete with shower unit and toilet, big enough to even use as a utility room as well. The two way featured two way mirror here is incredible!

Upstairs you will find 4 bedrooms, 2 great sized doubles and 2 smaller rooms. To finish off is your upstairs family bathroom, modern and sleek in its design.

Hainault Forest Country Park is just minutes from your doorstep. You can spend as little or as long as you like in here. It covers more than 300 acres, with a fishing lake, zoo, guided walks, bridleways and a Nature Trail. There are plenty of open field areas for picnics, games or dog walking, and you can hire a boat to go out on the lake. Facilities for children are excellent, with a farm and several large play areas to enjoy. There is also a great cafe.

Grange Hill station is within walking distance along with plenty of bus stops along the way.

Please quote lbsh on all telephone enquiries

detailedDescription: *Guide Price £675,000 to £700,000* A wonderful five bedroom, end of terrace home nestled just a short walk from South Woodford Central Line Station and local amenities. The house has recently been refurbished with a new boiler fitted and central heating system, completely rewired and fresh plaster skim throughout and painted. Walking in from the residential street you are welcomed into a large hallway leading to the first reception room awash with natural light. The downstairs further comprises of a second reception room, large modern kitchen with breakfast bar and space for dining, guest shower room and an office space. Upstairs there are five bedrooms, an en-suite shower room to the master bedroom, modern family bathroom, and a loft space for storage. Providing enough space for a growing family the property further boasts off street parking to the front, a well maintained rear garden, double glazing throughout and a chain free sale. Here on Maybank Road you are nestled on a quiet, residential street yet perfectly positioned to benefit from a short walk to South Woodford Central Line Station as well as easy access to the A406 and M11. Residents on this road also have the wonderful amenities of South Woodford to enjoy with its bars, restaurants, boutiques shops and choice of supermarkets including Sainsbury’s, Waitrose and Marks & Spencer. This house also benefits from Tesco being just down the Road and a Maybank Food and Wine on the doorstep. With outstanding local schools, charming public green spaces and ideal commuting options this is a perfect property to make your next home.

detailedDescription:
A pair of newly built 5 bedroom townhouses offering exceptional accommodation extending to 2,300 sq ft situated in a prime position less than a mile from a tube station and local amenities.

Location

South Woodford tube station 0.8 mile, Stratford station 7 miles, Bancroft's School 1.6 miles, Forest School 1.5 miles

Derby Road is a popular residential street ideally placed for local amenities. There is a comprehensive range of shops, restaurants and bars nearby and excellent transport links into London. There are several well regarded state and primary schools within easy reach and good leisure facilities.

Description

This pair of newly built townhouses perfectly reflect modern living requirements and offer outstanding accommodation arranged over four floors, complemented by off road parking, generous gardens and a first class location. The houses have been built to the highest standards incorporating many modern conveniences including:-

. Quality underfloor heating which gives excellent control at a low running cost

. Low energy mood lighting throughout

. Kitchen/breakfast/living room with the latest Miele appliances, granite worktops and smooth clean glass handless cabinetry

. TV and satellite connection in all rooms

The ground floor comprises a light and airy reception room which leads to an inner hallway with access to a guest cloakroom and a well equipped utility room with separate access. Of particular note is the wonderful kitchen/dining/family room which occupies the entire rear of the house. The kitchen offers a range of quality fitted cupboards, integrated appliances and a breakfast bar. The living/dining area has a lantern ceiling light which floods the room with natural light and seamlessly flows via fully retractable bifold doors to the large patio area ideal for barbeques bringing the outside inside.

The first floor comprises a main bedroom suite with bathroom and there is a room which could be used as second reception room or additional bedroom. The second and third floors add three further bedrooms and two bathrooms.

The house has a paved driveway with parking to the front with side access to the rear garden with a paved patio and lawn.

Square Footage: 2294 sq ft

detailedDescription:
** stunning 2 bed apartment in modern development by goodmayes station **

* 40% shared ownership *

* virtual tour available *

OneClickHomes present to the sales market, this beautifully presented two bedroom apartment on the second floor of this modern gated development in Goodmayes, IG3. The development is less than two years old having been completed on the old Lord Napier pub site on Green Lane in 2019 and boasts a number of features including IpGuard Smart Visitor Door Entry system, two communal roof terraces, allocated parking, and a communal garden. This is a 40% share of the property with rent to be paid for the remaining 60% owned by Newlon Housing. There is the opportunity to staircase up to the full 100%.

Accommodation comprises; a bright and spacious open plan reception room with fully integrated fitted kitchen, leading out to a private balcony, two double bedrooms and modern three piece bathroom. The property is presented very well with a south facing reception room and master bedroom giving the apartment lots of natural light throughout the day. To arrange a viewing please call the OneClickHomes sales team now.

Tenure Information

Shared Ownership - 40% Share
Leasehold. 123 years Remaining
Service Charge: Approx. £2000 per year
Ground Rent: £150 per year
Rent for Remaining 60% Share: £445.68 per month
Council Tax: Redbridge Band C, £1502 per year

Location

Napier Court is located on Green Lanes in Goodmayes, just 0.2 miles from Goodmayes Train Station (TfL Line) which is part of the impending Crossrail Link into Central London and Heathrow Airport. The property is located ideally for easy access into the City and beyond with a number of bus routes and road links. There are lots of local amenities including shops, bars and restaurants as well as the green spaces of Goodmayes Park all within short walking distance. The property is also conveniently located close to a choice of excellent local schools including Eastcourt Independent School.

detailedDescription:
Located within close proximity of both Barkingside Station and Newbury Park Station and just 0.3 miles from Ofsted 'outstanding rated' Fullwood Primary, is this extremely spacious, well presented 4 bedroom, extended, terraced house.

Upon entering the property, via the enclosed porch, the spacious hallway provides access to all the living accommodation and has stairs rising to the first floor.

Measuring close to 38ft. In length, the impressive through lounge / living / dining room is tastefully decorated with a modern, neutral palette and is flooded with light from the front window and sliding patio doors to the rear of the home. Awash with character, the space features decorative cornice, deep skirting board, ceiling roses, a centre fireplace and wooden flooring underfoot.

The sizeable kitchen boasts numerous wall and base units, worktop space and appliances such as grill, oven, hob, dish washer and fridge freezer. A single door provides external access.

Heading up to the first floor, there are two double bedrooms and a further single bedroom, currently used as a walk-in wardrobe. Each room is nicely presented with bedrooms 2 and 3 featuring wall to wall built-in storage units.

The family bathroom finishes the first floor layout.

Within the converted loft space is the master bedroom and shower room. Measuring 17’8 x 17’5, the bedroom room enjoys Velux windows to the front and dormer windows to the rear as well as handy eaves storage.

Externally, there is off street parking to the front via a brick paved driveway, whilst at the rear, the 135' garden commences with a patio area then is mostly laid to lawn with mature planting throughout.

detailedDescription:
Arbon & Miller are privileged to offer this immaculately decorative extended three double bedroom extended mid-terrace family home offered with no ongoing chain situated within this popular residential location within a short walk from local shopping facilities and bus services. The property is also positioned with 0.6 miles of both Hainault & Fairlop Central Line Stations, which offer direct access to Stratford Station within approx. 20 mins and Liverpool Street Station within approx. 30mins. Arranged over three floors, this spacious property benefits from delightful views overlooking Oakfield Playing Fields towards the rear. The ground floor comprises of a 13ft8 Lounge, 15ft9 Feature Kitchen and 13ft Rear Addition. The first floor boasts 11ft5 Bedroom One, 12ft5 Bedroom Two, 8ft3 Bathroom/WC and Landing with staircase leading to second floor 16ft5 Master Bedroom/Loft Room. Externally there is an well-maintained 85ft Rear Garden and off-street parking spaces to front. A well appointed family home which can only be truly appreciated by carrying out an internal inspection.

Four light double glazed bay with fanlights over, double radiator, laminated style wood strip flooring, coved cornice, door to:

Range of feature base and wall units, working surfaces, cupboards and drawers, one and a half bowl stainless steel sink top with mixer tap and drainer, four ring gas hob with extractor fan over, built-in double oven, plumbing for washing machine, tiled floor, part tiled walls, wall-mounted combi-boiler, concealed lighting to base units, spotlights to ceiling, coved cornice, built-in under stairs storage cupboard, light double glazed window with fanlight over to rear, double glazed door with double glazed sidelight leading to:

Two light double glazed window with fanlight over to rear, radiator, coved cornice.

Corner panel enclosed bath with stainless steel mixer taps and shower attachment, low level wc, vanity was hand basin with stainless steel mixer tap, feature walk-in shower cubicle with 'rainforest' style shower head and separate shower attachment, coved cornice, concealed colour lighting to skirting, heated towel rail, tiled walls, obscure double glazed window with fanlight over to rear.

detailedDescription:
Six bedroom, three bathroom, terraced house situated in a popular location in South Woodford.
To the ground floor of the property there is a spacious double bedroom with tall ceiling and bay window. To the rear of the property there is separate kitchen with plenty of modern white fitted units, hard work surfaces, oven, hob and fridge/freezer. There is a sitting room/communal lounge which is bright with neutral décor and French doors leading out the west facing garden.
On the first floor there are three bedrooms, all of good size. A family bathroom with white bathroom benefitting from both a bath and overhead shower, and also a heated towel rail. There is a further WC with utility area that is perfect for doing laundry.
On the second floor there two further bedrooms, one to the front of the property with Velux window and one overlooking the garden to the rear of the house. There is also a separate shower room with white suite and a heated towel rail.
The property has been refurbished to a good standard, with hard flooring and bright neutral decor throughout. The property is currently tenanted and a registered HMO achieving good rents. The property would suit any investor looking to add to his portfolio or a large family looking for a house in good condition that doesn’t needing any work.
The property is located in South Woodford just 0.7 miles from the Central Line Station allowing easy access into the City, and South Woodford High Street with its many shops, restaurants, bars and cafes. The property is also well situated for a variety of schools such Oakdale School 0.6 miles away, Churchfields School 0.8 miles away and Woodbridge High School 0.8 miles away.
Viewings are by appointment only and Video Tours are available on request.
