detailedDescription:
A truly stunning two double bedroom apartment in the sought-after gated development that is Repton Park, with acres of beautiful grounds. This apartment has high ceilings with ornate covings, tall sash windows, a large lounge/dining room, with an amazing modern en-suite shower and bathroom.

This stunning apartment is on the first floor with a wide staircase leading to the property, the entrance hallway has a large storage cupboard with excellent storage space and fitted hanging rails. There is also a security entry phone system, a spacious airing / storage cupboard and a solid oak floor finish.

The large spacious lounge / dining room has a high ceiling with an ornate coving, two tall double glazed sash windows and a solid oak floor.

The fitted kitchen / breakfast room has a large fold away breakfast bar area, the best range of wall and base fitted storage units, fully integrated appliances including a four ring gas hob with an extractor, an electric fan-assisted oven with a grill, a dishwasher, a microwave oven and plumbing for a washing machine. There are tiled splash backs, two double glazed sash windows and a tiled floor finish.

The master bedroom is of epic proportion with two tall double glazed sash windows, a large floor area with a window and a stunning en-suite wet room.

A fully-tiled wall, double shower area, a large overhead raindrop sprinkler head and a separate hand held shower. There is a stylish Bauhaus hand basin with a fitted storage shelf, a heated towel radiator, a fitted wall cabinet with inset lighting and a tiled floor finish.

Bedroom two has fitted wardrobes to one complete wall and a tall double glazed sash window.

There is an amazing family bathroom which is finished to a high standard, it has a bath with a wall mounted shower and a shower screen. There is a modern Duravit hand basin with shelving, a stylish heated towel radiator, the walls and the flooring are fully tiled.

Externally there are two allocated parking spaces and additional visitors parking, there are acres of beautifully landscaped grounds for residents to enjoy, as well as an on-site virgin active gym-spa with a bistro, a 24 hour concierge and an excellent patrolled security service.

*****excellent potential to extend into the loft space subject to planning permission, please call for more information*****

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Madison Fox take great pleasure in bringing to the market this wonderfully unique five bedroom house set within one of the original water towers and located in a secluded part of the 'ever popular' Repton Park. Set over four floors and offering some spectacular views, this fantastic home boasts high ceilings including a domed ceiling in the living room, spiral staircase to all floors and a further 'Monks Staircase' leading to the top floor.

The property offers allocated parking for two cars plus ample visitors parking and has a very private wrap around garden which has a patio area with the remainder laid to lawn.

The accommodation comprises of an entrance hall with guest cloakroom, a magnificent circular living room with a 19' diameter, dining room and kitchen/breakfast room. The first floor provides a double bedroom and bathroom, the second floor provides the master bedroom with en-suite and dressing room, the third floor provides two further bedrooms and a bathroom and the top offers a fifth double bedroom that could easily be used as a cinema/games room.

Repton Park is located within easy reach of Woodford Central Line Stations which offer easy access into London. Also within close proximity is the ever popular parade of shops on High Road (Woodford) and Brook Parade (Chigwell) with their comprehensive range of shops, boutiques, eateries and restaurants. Further local amenities include, Virgin Active Premier Club Repton Park and Tescos Superstore. The area offers a range of access to primary and secondary schools, both private and state. By car M25 (junction 26) and M11 (Junction 5 - Southbound) are within easy reach.

Originally Claybury Hospital, Repton Park was sympathetically developed by Crest Nicholson in conjunction with English Heritage and the London Wildlife Trust, converting the original buildings and adding new houses and apartments. Arguably the local areas most prestigious development further benefits include on site CCTV, 24hr concierge service, Virgin Active spa, gym and bistro, allocated and visitor parking and approximately 235 acres of landscaped grounds.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautifully located two bedroom apartment in a purpose-built gated development, complete with concierge and communal garden. The ancient greenery of Wanstead Flats is right outside your front door, while Leytonstone High Road's shops and bars are just twelve minutes on foot and also High Street Wanstead.

You're well placed for public transport - Leytonstone tube station is just a sixteen minute leafy stroll away and will get you directly to Liverpool Street in fourteen minutes, or Oxford Circus in twenty five. Stratford, for the Queen Elizabeth Park and Westfield Shopping Centre, is just two stops and five minutes away.

If you lived here...

You'll be enjoying country living in the heart of East London - not just among the leafy environs and spectacular views of Bush Wood right outside and Wanstead flats, but also in your well-maintained communal garden - a perfect mix of manicured lawn and a canopy of foliage. Your tri-aspect lounge comes in at a generous 220 square foot with recessed spot lighting, engineered timber flooring and ample space for dining.

Your master bedroom is a generous double of 160 square feet, while next door your second bedroom is a seventy square foot single; both coming with those amazing views. The kitchen is a welcoming space with slate tiling underfoot, a handsome timber suite and gleaming white tiles. Finally you have off-street parking and drivers can be on the A12 in less than five minutes.

Fancy a stroll? Head through the woods and you're in Wanstead Flats - the greatest expanse of natural space for miles around, perfect for morning jogs and evening strolls. Heronry Pond is a twelve minute amble away with the equally tranquil Chalet Wood, Perch Pond and The Basin within further walking distance.

What else?

- This striking designer development has a impressive reception, on-site concierge and secure entryphone system. A long lease means you won't have any renewal worries.
- You have thirteen primaries/secondaries within a one mile radius, thirteen rated 'Good' or better by Ofsted, including the 'Outstanding' Davies Lane Primary School, a mere eleven minute stroll away.
- For your new local there's no better choice than the nearby North Star, a hidden gem of an old-fashioned pub just half a mile away, tucked away from the main road and serving the best Thai food.

Hallway

Lounge/ Dining Room (4.48m x 5.35m (14'8" x 17'6"))

Kitchen (4.48m x 1.90m (14'8" x 6'2"))

Bedroom (2.09m x 3.88m (6'10" x 12'8" ))

Bedroom (3.45m x 5.30m (11'3" x 17'4"))

Bathroom (2.26m x 2.04m (7'4" x 6'8"))

A word from the owner....

"Living in Belgrave Heights has been an absolute delight. From waking up to the birds singing, the squires playing together to hiking in the forest next door plus the view from my windows, its hard to remember i am living right in the middle of east London. This flats is really large compared to those i remember viewing before i settled on this 8 years ago but now have to leave London so its time to say goodbye to it. Its a very secure building, with plenty of space and storage, there really isn't any fault to mention, you have to see it to believe it. The best thing about living in Wanstead is the community and village vibe you get here not to mention the 3 tube line nearby plus an overhead line nearby in Wanstead park."

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A superbly designed collection of 1 & 2 bedroom East London apartments only 30 minutes from the heart of the city with countryside nearby. All units available with Help to Buy.

Loft-inspired living spaces, hi-tech appliances, sleek designer bathrooms and much more

Just 27 minutes by tube from Oxford Circus, South Woodford is deceptively well connected to central London, while having a wealth of countryside and green spaces on the doorstep. There are plenty of city living perks to this corner of East London, such as the shops and restaurants of George Lane, the Olympic Park at Stratford or Europe's longest outdoor street market (quite a claim) in neighbouring Walthamstow. But equally, you're a few short moments away from one of London's quietest river paths, walking trails in Wanstead, wetlands, white water rafting and country parks.

At your new home at Maybank Lofts you'll feel like you're living the high life, Big Apple-style, in an executive apartment that's been designed with all the modern conveniences you need. Each apartment has been built with space in mind, whether you opt for one bedroom or two, with high ceilings, generously proportioned living spaces and access to private terraces. Inspired by loft living in New York, large windows allow excellent natural light, while clean lines and cool tones promote the feeling of space.

*Images are CGIs and are only indicative of the finished apartments - all sizes and finishes are subject to change.

title: 1 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Guide price £300,000 - £325,000 Desirably located in Chigwell Row and within walking distance to Grange hill central line station is this exceptionally spacious One bedroom apartment, spanning over 730 feet and nestled in a quiet and popular cul-de-sac. The property consists of a large bedroom, bathroom, kitchen⁄diner and comes with an allocated parking space in addition to a lease of over 100 years remaining.
The spacious hallway has an intercom system that is connected to the communal doors at the entrance of the building which provides additional security. Also within the hallway are two large storage cupboards. As you enter the kitchen⁄diner you are instantly overwhelmed by the size, space and radiant atmosphere it offers, with plenty of room to add large living room furniture. The modern fitted kitchen is fully tiled and currently has an electric cooker but also offers more room to add any additional appliances. The bedroom is very well proportioned with adequate space for large bedroom furniture, a huge window allowing plenty of light to flood through and carpeted gives that additional warm and cosy feel. address: Mayfair Court, Manor Road, Chigwell IG7
detailedDescription:
**Guide Price £700,000 - £750,000**

Madison Fox take great pride in offering to the market this two bedroom first floor luxury apartment set within Mayfair Court, a brand new luxury development of just four apartments set within secure gated grounds and located on the prestigious Manor Road, Chigwell. The thoughtfully designed apartments have engineered wood flooring throughout, underfloor heating and an integrated bluetooth speaker system.

This beautiful apartment has a grand entrance hall accessed via solid oak doors and leads to the spacious open plan kitchen/lounge/diner, the modern fitted kitchen offers a range of integrated Siemens appliances, instant hot water tap and a cold water filtration system and fitted units with quartz work surfaces. The premier bedroom measures over 17ft and provides a three piece en-suite bathroom. There is a further double bedroom, family bathroom and a study which could be utilised as a third bedroom.

To the front of the property are two secure allocated parking spaces, visitors parking and a private rear garden.

Manor Road is located within easy reach of Chigwell, Woodford & Grange Hill Central Line Stations which offer easy access into London. Also within close proximity is the ever popular parade of shops on Chigwell's Brook Parade and High Road, Woodford with their comprehensive range of shops, boutiques, eateries and restaurants. Further local amenities include, David Lloyd Leisure Centre and Chigwell Golf Club. The area offers a range of access to some fantastic primary and secondary schools, both private and state. By car M25 (junction 26) and M11 (Junction 5 - Southbound) are within easy reach.

Externally, there is an attractive and private communal rear garden.

This beautiful property comes with A new longer than average 150 year lease and has A low maintenance charge.

For more information or to arrange A viewing of this fine home please contact john thoma bespoke estate agency.

detailedDescription:
Proudly positioned at the top of the high road facing George Lane, this develop creates a luxurious style of living with 24 hr concierge service, lifts to all floors, use of a cinema room, immaculate communal gardens and allocated underground parking space complete with CCTV cameras which are monitored to the Concierge. The home itself is in great condition, with two double bedrooms, both featuring fitted wardrobes and the master bedroom benefiting from an a contemporary en-suite shower room and a stunning bay window. There is also a spacious family bathroom. The large, unique reception room has an open plan fitted kitchen, with mobile island and has more than enough room to house a dining area and lounge space. The reception then leads onto a large private balcony with views over the tranquil and beautifully kept communal gardens.

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
Positioned opposite The Drive, one of South Woodfords most prestigious roads, you will find Walbrook; an exclusive development of large, purpose built apartments close to both Wanstead High Street and George Lane shops. Close to both Snaresbrook (0.5 miles) and South Woodford Stations (0.6 miles) as well as a number of bus routes, the property is conveniently positioned for commuters, with a number of other amenities such as the Odeon Cinema, Waitrose and Sainsbury's supermarkets and Epping Forest within reach.

The apartments are well known for their generous proportions and natural light thanks to the large rooms and floor-to-ceiling windows and this property is no exception, boasting unrivalled views towards London and a decked terrace on two sides. The block is accessed via a secure entry phone system with lift serving all floors.

On entering the apartment one is immediately impressed with the well presented, light and airy accommodation.
The hallway features a useful utility cupboard and guest cloakroom and opens into the formal dining room, being flooded by natural light from the high level windows and terrace door. The kitchen is fitted with a comprehensive rage of cabinets complimented by Quartz work surfaces and Siemens integrated appliances. A breakfast bar provides a useful area for casual dining or coffee break.
A stunning 24' sitting room with full height windows and double doors leading to the terrace provides the "wow factor" of the apartment with uninterrupted breath-taking views towards the London skyline.
There are three bedrooms, the principle with fitted wardrobes, the second with en-suite shower room and the third with walk in wardrobe/study area. A luxury family bathroom with both bath and shower, twin wash bowls and heated towel rail completes the accommodation.
A decked terrace with built in seating runs along two sides of the apartment offering plenty of room for a table and chairs. There is a communal garden area and two garages en-block.
The apartment is well placed for sought after schooling and transport links include local bus routes, M11 and M25.
